characters.name: Albedo
characters.title: Kreideprinz
characters.description: A genius known as the Kreideprinz, he is the Chief Alchemist and Captain of the Investigation Team of the Knights of Favonius.

abilities.name: Normal Attack
abilities.description: Perform up to 5 rapid strikes.

abilities.name: Charged Attack
abilities.description: Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to unleash 2 rapid sword strikes.

abilities.name: Plunging Attack
abilities.description: Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

skills.title: Abiogenesis: Solar Isotoma
skills.description: Albedo creates a Solar Isotoma using alchemy, which deals AoE Geo DMG on appearance.

abilities.name: Solar Isotoma
abilities.description: has the following properties:
descriptions: When opponents within the Solar Isotoma field take DMG, the Solar Isotoma will generate Transient Blossoms which deal AoE Geo DMG. DMG dealt scales off Albedo's DEF.
Transient Blossoms can only be generated once every 2s.

When a character is located at the locus of the Solar Isotoma, the Solar Isotoma will accumulate Geo power to form a crystallized platform that lifts the character up to a certain height. Only one crystallized platform can exist at a time.
Solar Isotoma is considered a Geo construct. Only one Solar Isotoma created by Albedo himself can exist at a time.
Hold to designate the location of the skill.

skills.title: Rite of Progeniture: Tectonic Tide
skills.description:
Under Albedo's command, Geo crystals surge and burst forth, dealing AoE Geo DMG in front of him.
If a Solar Isotoma created by Albedo himself is on the field, 7 Fatal Blossoms will be generated in the Solar Isotoma field, bursting violently into bloom and dealing AoE Geo DMG.
Tectonic Tide DMG and Fatal Blossom DMG will not generate Transient Blossoms.

passives.title: Flash of Genius
passives.description: When Albedo crafts Weapon Ascension Materials, he has a 10% chance to receive double the product.

passives.title: Calcite Might
passives.description: Transient Blossoms generated by Abiogenesis: Solar Isotoma deal 25% more DMG to opponents whose HP is below 50%.

passives.title: Homuncular Nature
passives.description: Using Rite of Progeniture: Tectonic Tide increases the Elemental Mastery of nearby party members by 125 for 10s.

constellations.title: Flower of Eden
constellations.description: Transient Blossoms generated by Albedo's Abiogenesis: Solar Isotoma regenerate 1.2 Energy for Albedo.

constellations.title: Opening of Phanerozoic
constellations.description: Transient Blossoms generated by Abiogenesis: Solar Isotoma grant Albedo Fatal Reckoning for 30s:
descriptions: Unleashing Rite of Progeniture: Tectonic Tide consumes all stacks of Fatal Reckoning. Each stack of Fatal Reckoning consumed increases the DMG dealt by Fatal Blossoms and Rite of Progeniture: Tectonic Tide's burst DMG by 30% of Albedo's DEF.
This effect stacks up to 4 times.

constellations.title: Grace of Helios
constellations.description:
Increases the Level of Abiogenesis: Solar Isotoma by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.title: Descent of Divinity
constellations.description: Active party members within the Solar Isotoma field have their Plunging Attack DMG increased by 30%.

constellations.title: Tide of Hadean
constellations.description:
Increases the Level of Rite of Progeniture: Tectonic Tide by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.title: Dust of Purification
constellations.description: Active party members within the Solar Isotoma field who are protected by a shield created by Crystallize have their DMG increased by 17%.

characters.name: Aloy
characters.title: Savior From Another World
characters.description: Formerly an outcast, now a hunter of unparalleled skill. Ready to do the right thing at any time.

abilities.name: Normal Attack
abilities.description: Perform up to 4 consecutive shots with a bow.

abilities.name: Charged Attack
abilities.description:
Perform a more precise Aimed Shot with increased DMG.
While aiming, biting frost will accumulate on the arrowhead. A fully charged frost arrow will deal Cryo DMG.

abilities.name: Plunging Attack
abilities.description: Fires off a shower of arrows in mid-air before falling and striking the ground, dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

skills.title: Frozen Wilds
skills.description:
Aloy throws a Freeze Bomb in the targeted direction that explodes on impact, dealing Cryo DMG. After it explodes, the Freeze Bomb will split up into many Chillwater Bomblets that explode on contact with opponents or after a short delay, dealing Cryo DMG.
When a Freeze Bomb or Chillwater Bomblet hits an opponent, the opponent's ATK is decreased and Aloy receives 1 Coil stack.
Aloy can gain up to 1 Coil stack every 0.1s.

abilities.name: Coil
descriptions: Each stack increases Aloy's Normal Attack DMG.

When Aloy has 4 Coil stacks, all stacks of Coil are cleared. She then enters the Rushing Ice state, which further increases the DMG dealt by her Normal Attacks and converts her Normal Attack DMG to Cryo DMG.
While in the Rushing Ice state, Aloy cannot obtain new Coil stacks.
Coil effects will be cleared 30s after Aloy leaves the field.

stats: Rushing Ice Normal Attack DMG Bonus|{param8}%

skills.title: Prophecies of Dawn
skills.description: Aloy throws a Power Cell filled with Cryo in the targeted direction, then detonates it with an arrow, dealing AoE Cryo DMG.

passives.title: Easy Does It
passives.description: When Aloy is in the party, animals who produce Fowl, Raw Meat, or Chilled Meat will not be startled when party members approach them.

passives.title: Combat Override
passives.description: When Aloy receives the Coil effect from Frozen Wilds, her ATK is increased by 16%, while nearby party members' ATK is increased by 8%. This effect lasts 10s.

passives.title: Strong Strike
passives.description: When Aloy is in the Rushing Ice state conferred by Frozen Wilds, her Cryo DMG Bonus increases by 3.5% every 1s. A maximum Cryo DMG Bonus increase of 35% can be gained in this way.

constellations.title: Star of Another World
constellations.description: The time has not yet come for this person's corner of the night sky to light up.

constellations.title: Star of Another World
constellations.description: The time has not yet come for this person's corner of the night sky to light up.

constellations.title: Star of Another World
constellations.description: The time has not yet come for this person's corner of the night sky to light up.

constellations.title: Star of Another World
constellations.description: The time has not yet come for this person's corner of the night sky to light up.

constellations.title: Star of Another World
constellations.description: The time has not yet come for this person's corner of the night sky to light up.

constellations.title: Star of Another World
constellations.description: The time has not yet come for this person's corner of the night sky to light up.

characters.name: Amber
characters.title: Gliding Champion
characters.description: Always energetic and full of life, Amber's the best — albeit only — Outrider of the Knights of Favonius.

abilities.name: Normal Attack
abilities.description: Perform up to 5 consecutive shots with a bow.

abilities.name: Charged Attack
abilities.description:
Perform a more precise Aimed Shot with increased DMG.
While aiming, flames will accumulate on the arrowhead. A fully charged flaming arrow will deal Pyro DMG.

abilities.name: Plunging Attack
abilities.description: Fires off a shower of arrows in mid-air before falling and striking the ground, dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

skills.title: Explosive Puppet
skills.description: The ever-reliable Baron Bunny takes the stage.

abilities.name: Baron Bunny
descriptions: Continuously taunts the enemy, drawing their fire.
Baron Bunny's HP scales with Amber's Max HP.
When destroyed or when its timer expires, Baron Bunny explodes, dealing AoE Pyro DMG.

abilities.name: Hold
abilities.description:
Adjusts the throwing direction of Baron Bunny.
The longer the button is held, the further the throw.

skills.title: Fiery Rain
skills.description: Fires off a shower of arrows, dealing continuous AoE Pyro DMG.

passives.title: Gliding Champion
passives.description:
Decreases gliding Stamina consumption for your own party members by 20%.
Not stackable with Passive Talents that provide the exact same effects.

passives.title: Every Arrow Finds Its Target
passives.description: Increases the CRIT Rate of Fiery Rain by 10% and widens its AoE by 30%.

passives.title: Precise Shot
passives.description: Aimed Shot hits on weak points increase ATK by 15% for 10s.

constellations.title: One Arrow to Rule Them All
constellations.description: Fires 2 arrows per Aimed Shot. The second arrow deals 20% of the first arrow's DMG.

constellations.title: Bunny Triggered
constellations.description:
Baron Bunny, new and improved! Hitting Baron Bunny's foot with a fully-charged Aimed Shot manually detonates it.
Explosion via manual detonation deals 200% additional DMG.

constellations.title: It Burns!
constellations.description:
Increases the Level of Fiery Rain by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.title: It's Not Just Any Doll...
constellations.description: Decreases Explosive Puppet's CD by 20%. Adds 1 additional charge.

constellations.title: It's Baron Bunny!
constellations.description:
Increases the Level of Explosive Puppet by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.title: Wildfire
constellations.description: Fiery Rain increases all party members' Movement SPD by 15% and ATK by 15% for 10s.

characters.name: Arataki Itto
characters.title: Hanamizaka Heroics
characters.description: The first and greatest head of the Arataki Gang, famed throughout Inazuma City's Hanamizaka... Wait, what? You've never heard of them? Are you trying to be funny here?

abilities.name: Normal Attack
abilities.description:
Perform up to 4 consecutive strikes.
When the 2nd and 4th strikes hit opponents, Itto will gain 1 or 2 stacks of Superlative Superstrength, respectively.
Max 5 stacks. Triggering this effect will refresh the current duration of any existing stacks.
Additionally, Itto's Normal Attack combo does not immediately reset after sprinting or using his Elemental Skill, "Masatsu Zetsugi: Akaushi Burst!"

abilities.name: Charged Attack
abilities.description:
When holding to perform a Charged Attack, Itto unleashes a series of Arataki Kesagiri slashes without consuming Stamina. Instead, each Arataki Kesagiri slash consumes 1 stack of Superlative Superstrength. When the final stack is consumed, Itto delivers a powerful final slash.
If no stacks of Superlative Superstrength are available, Itto will perform a single Saichimonji Slash.

abilities.name: Plunging Attack
abilities.description: Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

skills.title: Masatsu Zetsugi: Akaushi Burst!
skills.description:
Hurls Ushi, the young akaushi bull and auxiliary member of the Arataki Gang, dealing Geo DMG to opponents on hit. When Ushi hits opponents, Arataki Itto gains 1 stack of Superlative Superstrength.
Ushi will remain on the field and provide support in the following ways:

descriptions: Taunts surrounding opponents and draws their attacks.
Inherits HP based on a percentage of Arataki Itto's Max HP.
When Ushi takes DMG, Arataki Itto gains 1 stack of Superlative Superstrength. Only 1 stack can be gained in this way every 2s.
Ushi will flee when its HP reaches 0 or its duration ends. It will grant Arataki Itto 1 stack of Superlative Superstrength when it leaves.

abilities.name: Hold
abilities.description:
Adjust throwing angle.
Ushi is considered a Geo construct. Arataki Itto can only deploy 1 Ushi on the field at any one time.

skills.title: Royal Descent: Behold, Itto the Evil!
skills.description: Time to show 'em the might of the Arataki Gang! For a time, Itto lets out his inner Raging Oni King, wielding his Oni King's Kanabou in battle.

abilities.description: This state has the following special properties:
descriptions: Converts Itto's Normal, Charged, and Plunging Attacks to Geo DMG. This cannot be overridden.
Increases Itto's Normal Attack SPD. Also increases his ATK based on his DEF.
On hit, the 1st and 3rd strikes of his attack combo will each grant Arataki Itto 1 stack of Superlative Superstrength.
Decreases Itto's Elemental and Physical RES by 20%.
The Raging Oni King state will be cleared when Itto leaves the field.

passives.title: Woodchuck Chucked
passives.description: When a party member uses attacks to obtain wood from a tree, they have a 25% chance to get an additional log of wood.

passives.title: Arataki Ichiban
passives.description: When Arataki Itto uses consecutive Arataki Kesagiri, he obtains the following effects:
descriptions: Each slash increases the ATK SPD of the next slash by 10%. Max ATK SPD increase is 30%.
Increases his resistance to interruption.
These effects will be cleared once he stops performing consecutive slashes.

passives.title: Bloodline of the Crimson Oni
passives.description: Arataki Kesagiri DMG is increased by 35% of Arataki Itto's DEF.

constellations.title: Stay a While and Listen Up
constellations.description: After using Royal Descent: Behold, Itto the Evil!, Arataki Itto gains 2 stacks of Superlative Superstrength. After 1s, Itto will gain 1 stack of Superlative Superstrength every 0.5s for 1.5s.

constellations.title: Gather 'Round, It's a Brawl!
constellations.description:
After using Royal Descent: Behold, Itto the Evil!, each party member whose Element is Geo will decrease that skill's CD by 1.5s and restore 6 Energy to Arataki Itto.
CD can be decreased by up to 4.5s in this manner. Max 18 Energy can be restored in this manner.

constellations.title: Horns Lowered, Coming Through
constellations.description:
Increases the Level of Masatsu Zetsugi: Akaushi Burst! by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.title: Jailhouse Bread and Butter
constellations.description: When the Raging Oni King state caused by Royal Descent: Behold, Itto the Evil! ends, all nearby party members gain 20% DEF and 20% ATK for 10s.

constellations.title: 10 Years of Hanamizaka Fame
constellations.description:
Increases the Level of Royal Descent: Behold, Itto the Evil! by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.title: Arataki Itto, Present!
constellations.description: Arataki Itto's Charged Attacks deal +70% Crit DMG. Additionally, when he uses Arataki Kesagiri, he has a 50% chance to not consume stacks of Superlative Superstrength.

characters.name: Barbara
characters.title: Shining Idol
characters.description: Every citizen of Mondstadt adores Barbara. She learned the word "idol" from a magazine.

abilities.name: Normal Attack
abilities.description: Perform up to 4 water splash attacks that deal Hydro DMG.

abilities.name: Charged Attack
abilities.description: Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to deal AoE Hydro DMG after a short casting time.

abilities.name: Plunging Attack
abilities.description: Gathering the might of Hydro, Barbara plunges towards the ground from mid-air, damaging all opponents in her path. Deals AoE Hydro DMG upon impact with the ground.

skills.title: Let the Show Begin♪
skills.description: Summons water droplets resembling musical notes that form a Melody Loop, dealing Hydro DMG to surrounding opponents and applying the Wet status to them.

abilities.name: Melody Loop
descriptions: On hit, Barbara's Normal Attacks heal your own party members and nearby teammates for a certain amount of HP, which scales with Barbara's Max HP.
On hit, Barbara's Charged Attack generates 4 times the amount of healing.
Periodically regenerates your own active character's HP.
Applies the Wet status to the character and to opponents who come in contact with them.

stats: HP Regeneration Per Hit|{param1}% Max HP + {param2}

skills.title: Shining Miracle♪
skills.description: Heals your own party members and nearby teammates for a large amount of HP that scales with Barbara's Max HP.

passives.title: With My Whole Heart♪
passives.description: When a Perfect Cooking is achieved on a dish with restorative effects, there is a 12% chance to obtain double the product.

passives.title: Glorious Season
passives.description: The Stamina Consumption of characters within Let the Show Begin♪'s Melody Loop is reduced by 12%.

passives.title: Encore
passives.description:
When your active character gains an Elemental Orb/Particle, the duration of the Melody Loop of Let the Show Begin♪ is extended by 1s.
The maximum extension is 5s.

constellations.title: Gleeful Songs
constellations.description: Barbara regenerates 1 Energy every 10s.

constellations.title: Vitality Burst
constellations.description:
Decreases the CD of Let the Show Begin♪ by 15%.
During the ability's duration, your active character gains a 15% Hydro DMG Bonus.

constellations.title: Star of Tomorrow
constellations.description:
Increases the Level of Shining Miracle♪ by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.title: Attentiveness be My Power
constellations.description:
Every opponent Barbara hits with her Charged Attack regenerates 1 Energy for her.
A maximum of 5 energy can be regenerated in this manner with any one Charged Attack.

constellations.title: The Purest Companionship
constellations.description:
Increases the Level of Let the Show Begin♪ by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.title: Dedicating Everything to You
constellations.description: When Barbara is in the party but not on the field, and one of your own party members falls:
descriptions: Automatically revives the fallen character.
Fully restores the revived character's HP to 100%.
This effect can only occur once every 15 mins.

characters.name: Beidou
characters.title: Uncrowned Lord of the Ocean
characters.description: Captain of her crew, The Crux. She's quite an unbound and forthright woman.

abilities.name: Normal Attack
abilities.description: Perform up to 5 consecutive strikes.

abilities.name: Charged Attack
abilities.description:
Drains Stamina over time to perform continuous slashes.
At the end of the sequence, perform a more powerful slash.

abilities.name: Plunging Attack
abilities.description: Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

skills.title: Tidecaller
skills.description: Nothing to worry about. Should anyone raise a hand against her or her men, she will avenge it ten-fold with sword and thunder.

abilities.name: Press
abilities.description: Accumulating the power of lightning, Beidou swings her blade forward fiercely, dealing Electro DMG.

abilities.name: Hold
abilities.description:
Lifts her weapon up as a shield. Max DMG absorbed scales off Beidou's Max HP.
Attacks using the energy stored within the greatsword upon release or once this ability's duration expires, dealing Electro DMG. DMG dealt scales with the number of times Beidou is attacked in the skill's duration. The greatest DMG Bonus will be attained once this effect is triggered twice.
The shield possesses the following properties:
descriptions: Has 250% Electro DMG Absorption Efficiency.
Applies the Electro element to Beidou upon activation.

skills.title: Stormbreaker
skills.description: Recalling her slaying of the great beast Haishan, Beidou calls upon that monstrous strength and the lightning to create a Thunderbeast's Targe around herself, dealing Electro DMG to nearby opponents.

abilities.name: Thunderbeast's Targe
descriptions: When Normal and Charged Attacks hit, they create a lightning discharge that can jump between opponents, dealing Electro DMG.
Increases the character's resistance to interruption, and decreases DMG taken.
A maximum of 1 lightning discharge can be triggered per second.

passives.title: Conqueror of Tides
passives.description:
Decreases swimming Stamina consumption for your own party members by 20%.
Not stackable with Passive Talents that provide the exact same effects.

passives.title: Retribution
passives.description: Counterattacking with Tidecaller at the precise moment when the character is hit grants the maximum DMG Bonus.

passives.title: Lightning Storm
passives.description: Gain the following effects for 10s after unleashing Tidecaller with its maximum DMG Bonus:
descriptions: DMG dealt by Normal and Charged Attacks is increased by 15%. ATK SPD of Normal and Charged Attacks is increased by 15%.
Greatly reduced delay before unleashing Charged Attacks.

constellations.title: Sea Beast's Scourge
constellations.description: When Stormbreaker is used:
descriptions: Creates a shield that absorbs up to 16% of Beidou's Max HP for 15s.
This shield absorbs Electro DMG 250% more effectively.

constellations.title: Upon the Turbulent Sea, the Thunder Arises
constellations.description: Stormbreaker's arc lightning can jump to 2 additional targets.

constellations.title: Summoner of Storm
constellations.description:
Increases the Level of Tidecaller by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.title: Stunning Revenge
constellations.description: Upon being attacked, Beidou's Normal Attacks gain an additional instance of 20% Electro DMG for 10s.

constellations.title: Crimson Tidewalker
constellations.description:
Increases the Level of Stormbreaker by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.title: Bane of Evil
constellations.description: During the duration of Stormbreaker, the Electro RES of surrounding opponents is decreased by 15%.

characters.name: Bennett
characters.title: Trial by Fire
characters.description: A good-natured adventurer from Mondstadt who's unfortunately extremely unlucky.

abilities.name: Normal Attack
abilities.description: Perform up to 5 rapid strikes.

abilities.name: Charged Attack
abilities.description: Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to unleash 2 rapid sword strikes.

abilities.name: Plunging Attack
abilities.description: Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

skills.title: Passion Overload
skills.description: Bennett puts all his fire and passion for adventuring into his sword. Results may vary based on how fired up he is...

abilities.name: Press
abilities.description: A single, swift flame strike that deals Pyro DMG.

abilities.name: Hold (Short)
abilities.description: Charges up, resulting in different effects when unleashed based on the Charge Level.
descriptions: Level 1: Strikes twice, dealing Pyro DMG and launching opponents.
Level 2: Unleashes 3 consecutive attacks that deal impressive Pyro DMG, but the last attack triggers an explosion that launches both Bennett and the enemy.
Bennett takes no damage from being launched.

skills.title: Fantastic Voyage
skills.description: Bennett performs a jumping attack that deals Pyro DMG, creating an Inspiration Field.

abilities.name: Inspiration Field
descriptions: If the health of a character within the AoE is equal to or falls below 70%, their health will continuously regenerate. The amount of HP restored scales off Bennett's Max HP.
If the health of a character within the AoE is higher than 70%, they gain an ATK Bonus that is based on Bennett's Base ATK.
Imbues characters within the AoE with Pyro.

stats: Continuous Regeneration Per Sec|{param2}% Max HP + {param3}

passives.title: It Should Be Safe...
passives.description: When dispatched on an expedition in Mondstadt, time consumed is reduced by 25%.

passives.title: Rekindle
passives.description: Decreases Passion Overload's CD by 20%.

passives.title: Fearnaught
passives.description: Within the area created by Fantastic Voyage, Passion Overload takes on the following effects:
descriptions: CD is reduced by 50%.
Bennett will not be launched by the effects of Charge Level 2.

constellations.title: Grand Expectation
constellations.description: Fantastic Voyage's ATK increase no longer has an HP restriction, and gains an additional 20% of Bennett's Base ATK.

constellations.title: Impasse Conqueror
constellations.description: When Bennett's HP falls below 70%, his Energy Recharge is increased by 30%.

constellations.title: Unstoppable Fervor
constellations.description:
Increases the Level of Passion Overload by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.title: Unexpected Odyssey
constellations.description:
Using a Normal Attack when executing the second attack of Passion Overload's Charge Level 1 allows an additional attack to be performed.
This additional attack does 135% of the second attack's DMG.

constellations.title: True Explorer
constellations.description:
Increases the Level of Fantastic Voyage by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.title: Fire Ventures with Me
constellations.description: Sword, Claymore, or Polearm-wielding characters inside Fantastic Voyage's radius gain a 15% Pyro DMG Bonus and their weapons are infused with Pyro.

characters.name: Chongyun
characters.title: Frozen Ardor
characters.description: A young exorcist from a family of exorcists. He does everything he can to suppress his abundance of yang energy.

abilities.name: Normal Attack
abilities.description: Perform up to 4 consecutive strikes.

abilities.name: Charged Attack
abilities.description:
Drains Stamina over time to perform continuous spinning attacks against all nearby opponents.
At the end of the sequence, perform a more powerful slash.

abilities.name: Plunging Attack
abilities.description: Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

skills.title: Spirit Blade: Chonghua's Layered Frost
skills.description:
Chongyun strikes the ground with his greatsword, causing a Cryo explosion in a circular AoE in front of him that deals Cryo DMG.
After a short delay, the cold air created by the Cryo explosion will coalesce into a Chonghua Frost Field, within which all Sword, Claymore and Polearm-wielding characters' weapons will be infused with Cryo.

skills.title: Spirit Blade: Cloud-Parting Star
skills.description:
Performing the secret hand seals, Chongyun summons 3 giant spirit blades in mid-air that fall to the earth one by one after a short delay, exploding as they hit the ground.
When the spirit blades explode, they will deal AoE Cryo DMG and launch opponents.

passives.title: Gallant Journey
passives.description: When dispatched on an expedition in Liyue, time consumed is reduced by 25%.

passives.title: Steady Breathing
passives.description: Sword, Claymore, or Polearm-wielding characters within the field created by Spirit Blade: Chonghua's Layered Frost have their Normal ATK SPD increased by 8%.

passives.title: Rimechaser Blade
passives.description: When the field created by Spirit Blade: Chonghua's Layered Frost disappears, another spirit blade will be summoned to strike nearby opponents, dealing 100% of Chonghua's Layered Frost's Skill DMG as AoE Cryo DMG. Opponents hit by this blade will have their Cryo RES decreased by 10% for 8s.

constellations.title: Ice Unleashed
constellations.description: The last attack of Chongyun's Normal Attack combo releases 3 ice blades. Each blade deals 50% of Chongyun's ATK as Cryo DMG to all opponents in its path.

constellations.title: Atmospheric Revolution
constellations.description: Elemental Skills and Elemental Bursts cast within the Frost Field created by Spirit Blade: Chonghua's Layered Frost have their CD time decreased by 15%.

constellations.title: Cloudburst
constellations.description:
Increases the Level of Spirit Blade: Cloud-parting Star by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.title: Frozen Skies
constellations.description:
Chongyun regenerates 1 Energy every time he hits an opponent affected by Cryo.
This effect can only occur once every 2s.

constellations.title: The True Path
constellations.description:
Increases the Level of Spirit Blade: Chonghua's Layered Frost by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.title: Rally of Four Blades
constellations.description:
Spirit Blade: Cloud-parting Star deals 15% more DMG to opponents with a lower percentage of their Max HP remaining than Chongyun.
This skill will also summon 1 additional spirit blade.

characters.name: Diluc
characters.title: The Dark Side of Dawn
characters.description: The tycoon of a winery empire in Mondstadt, unmatched in every possible way.

abilities.name: Normal Attack
abilities.description: Perform up to 4 consecutive strikes.

abilities.name: Charged Attack
abilities.description:
Drains Stamina over time to perform continuous slashes.
At the end of the sequence, perform a more powerful slash.

abilities.name: Plunging Attack
abilities.description: Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

skills.title: Searing Onslaught
skills.description:
Performs a forward slash that deals Pyro DMG.
This skill can be consecutively used 3 times. Enters CD if not cast again within a short period.

skills.title: Dawn
skills.description:
Releases intense flames to knock back nearby opponents, dealing Pyro DMG. The flames then converge into the weapon, summoning a Phoenix that flies forward and deals massive Pyro DMG to all opponents in its path. The Phoenix explodes upon reaching its destination, causing a large amount of AoE Pyro DMG.
The searing flames that run down his blade cause it to be infused with Pyro.

passives.title: Tradition of the Dawn Knight
passives.description: Refunds 15% of the ore used when crafting Claymore-type weapons.

passives.title: Relentless
passives.description: Diluc's Charged Attack Stamina Cost is decreased by 50%, and its duration is increased by 3s.

passives.title: Blessing of Phoenix
passives.description: The Pyro Infusion provided by Dawn lasts for 4s longer. Additionally, Diluc gains 20% Pyro DMG Bonus during the duration of this effect.

constellations.title: Conviction
constellations.description: Diluc deals 15% more DMG to opponents whose HP is above 50%.

constellations.title: Searing Ember
constellations.description:
When Diluc takes DMG, his ATK increases by 10% and his ATK SPD increases by 5%. Lasts for 10s.
This effect can stack up to 3 times and can only occur once every 1.5s.

constellations.title: Fire and Steel
constellations.description:
Increases the Level of Searing Onslaught by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.title: Flowing Flame
constellations.description:
Casting Searing Onslaught in rhythm greatly increases damage dealt.
2s after casting Searing Onslaught, casting the next Searing Onslaught in the combo deals 40% additional DMG. This effect lasts for 2s.

constellations.title: Phoenix, Harbinger of Dawn
constellations.description:
Increases the Level of Dawn by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.title: Flaming Sword, Nemesis of the Dark
constellations.description:
After casting Searing Onslaught, the next 2 Normal Attacks within the next 6s will have their DMG and ATK SPD increased by 30%.
Additionally, Searing Onslaught will not interrupt the Normal Attack combo.

characters.name: Diona
characters.title: Kätzlein Cocktail
characters.description: A young lady who has inherited trace amounts of non-human blood. She is the incredibly popular bartender of the Cat's Tail tavern.

abilities.name: Normal Attack
abilities.description: Perform up to 5 consecutive shots with a bow.

abilities.name: Charged Attack
abilities.description:
Perform a more precise Aimed Shot with increased DMG.
While aiming, biting frost will accumulate on the arrowhead. A fully charged frost arrow will deal Cryo DMG.

abilities.name: Plunging Attack
abilities.description: Fires off a shower of arrows in mid-air before falling and striking the ground, dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

skills.title: Icy Paws
skills.description:
Fires an Icy Paw that deals Cryo DMG to opponents and forms a shield on hit.
The shield's DMG Absorption scales based on Diona's Max HP, and its duration scales off the number of Icy Paws that hit their target.

abilities.name: Press
abilities.description: Rapidly fires off 2 Icy Paws.

abilities.name: Hold
abilities.description:
Dashes back quickly before firing five Icy Paws.
The shield created by a Hold attack will gain a 75% DMG Absorption Bonus.
The shield has a 250% Cryo DMG Absorption Bonus, and will cause your active character to become affected by Cryo at the point of formation for a short duration.

stats: Base Shield DMG Absorption|{param2}% Max HP + {param3}

skills.title: Signature Mix
skills.description: Tosses out a special cold brew that deals AoE Cryo DMG and creates a Drunken Mist in an AoE.

abilities.name: Drunken Mist
descriptions: Deals continuous Cryo DMG to opponents within the AoE.
Continuously regenerates the HP of characters within the AoE.

stats: HP Regeneration Over Time|{param3}% Max HP + {param4}

passives.title: Complimentary Bar Food
passives.description: When a Perfect Cooking is achieved on a dish with restorative effects, there is a 12% chance to obtain double the product.

passives.title: Cat's Tail Secret Menu
passives.description: Characters shielded by Icy Paws have their Movement SPD increased by 10% and their Stamina Consumption decreased by 10%.

passives.title: Drunkards' Farce
passives.description: Opponents who enter the AoE of Signature Mix have 10% decreased ATK for 15s.

constellations.title: A Lingering Flavor
constellations.description: Regenerates 15 Energy for Diona after the effects of Signature Mix end.

constellations.title: Shaken, Not Purred
constellations.description:
Increases Icy Paws' DMG by 15%, and increases its shield's DMG Absorption by 15%.
Additionally, when paws hit their targets, creates a shield for other nearby characters on the field with 50% of the Icy Paws shield's DMG Absorption for 5s.

constellations.title: A—Another Round?
constellations.description:
Increases the Level of Signature Mix by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.title: Wine Industry Slayer
constellations.description: Within the radius of Signature Mix, Diona's charge time for aimed shots is reduced by 60%

constellations.title: Double Shot, On The Rocks
constellations.description:
Increases the Level of Icy Paws by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.title: Cat's Tail Closing Time
constellations.description: Characters within Signature Mix's radius will gain the following effects based on their HP amounts:
descriptions: Increases Incoming Healing Bonus by 30% when HP falls below or is equal to 50%.
Elemental Mastery increased by 200 when HP is above 50%.

characters.name: Eula
characters.title: Dance of the Shimmering Wave
characters.description: The Spindrift Knight, a scion of the old aristocracy, and the Captain of the Knights of Favonius Reconnaissance Company. The reason for which a descendant of the ancient nobles might join the Knights remains a great mystery in Mondstadt to this very day.

abilities.name: Normal Attack
abilities.description: Perform up to 5 consecutive strikes.

abilities.name: Charged Attack
abilities.description:
Drains Stamina over time to perform continuous slashes.
At the end of the sequence, perform a more powerful slash.

abilities.name: Plunging Attack
abilities.description: Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

skills.title: Icetide Vortex
skills.description: Sharp frost, swift blade.

abilities.name: Press
abilities.description:
Slashes swiftly, dealing Cryo DMG.
When it hits an opponent, Eula gains a stack of Grimheart that stacks up to 2 times. These stacks can only be gained once every 0.3s.

abilities.name: Grimheart
abilities.description: Increases Eula's resistance to interruption and DEF.

abilities.name: Hold
abilities.description:
Wielding her sword, Eula consumes all the stacks of Grimheart and lashes forward, dealing AoE Cryo DMG to opponents in front of her.
If Grimheart stacks are consumed, surrounding opponents will have their Physical RES and Cryo RES decreased.
Each consumed stack of Grimheart will be converted into an Icewhirl Brand that deals Cryo DMG to nearby opponents.

skills.title: Glacial Illumination
skills.description:
Brandishes her greatsword, dealing Cryo DMG to nearby opponents and creating a Lightfall Sword that follows her around for a duration of up to 7s.
While present, the Lightfall Sword increases Eula's resistance to interruption. When Eula's own Normal Attack, Elemental Skill, and Elemental Burst deal DMG to opponents, they will charge the Lightfall Sword, which can gain an energy stack once every 0.1s.
Once its duration ends, the Lightfall Sword will descend and explode violently, dealing Physical DMG to nearby opponents.
This DMG scales on the number of energy stacks the Lightfall Sword has accumulated.
If Eula leaves the field, the Lightfall Sword will explode immediately.

passives.title: Aristocratic Introspection
passives.description: When Eula crafts Character Talent Materials, she has a 10% chance to receive double the product.

passives.title: Roiling Rime
passives.description: If 2 stacks of Grimheart are consumed upon unleashing the Holding Mode of Icetide Vortex, a Shattered Lightfall Sword will be created that will explode immediately, dealing 50% of the basic Physical DMG dealt by a Lightfall Sword created by Glacial Illumination.

passives.title: Wellspring of War-Lust
passives.description: When Glacial Illumination is cast, the CD of Icetide Vortex is reset and Eula gains 1 stack of Grimheart.

constellations.title: Tidal Illusion
constellations.description:
Every time Icetide Vortex's Grimheart stacks are consumed, Eula's Physical DMG is increased by 30% for 6s.
Each stack consumed will increase the duration of this effect by 6s up to a maximum of 18s.

constellations.title: Lady of Seafoam
constellations.description: Decreases the CD of Icetide Vortex's Holding Mode, rendering it identical to Press CD.

constellations.title: Lawrence Pedigree
constellations.description:
Increases the Level of Glacial Illumination by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.title: The Obstinacy of One's Inferiors
constellations.description: Lightfall Swords deal 25% increased DMG against opponents with less than 50% HP.

constellations.title: Chivalric Quality
constellations.description:
Increases the Level of Icetide Vortex by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.title: Noble Obligation
constellations.description: Lightfall Swords created by Glacial Illumination start with 5 stacks of energy. Normal Attacks, Elemental Skills, and Elemental Bursts have a 50% chance to grant the Lightfall Sword an additional stack of energy.

characters.name: Fischl
characters.title: Prinzessin der Verurteilung!
characters.description: A mysterious girl who calls herself "Prinzessin der Verurteilung" and travels with a night raven named Oz.

abilities.name: Normal Attack
abilities.description: Perform up to 5 consecutive shots with a bow.

abilities.name: Charged Attack
abilities.description:
Perform a more precise Aimed Shot with increased DMG.
While aiming, the dark lightning spirits of Immernachtreich shall heed the call of their Prinzessin and indwell the enchanted arrowhead. When fully indwelt, the Rachsüchtig Blitz shall deal immense Electro DMG.

abilities.name: Plunging Attack
abilities.description: Fires off a shower of arrows in mid-air before falling and striking the ground, dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

skills.title: Nightrider
skills.description:
Summons Oz. The night raven forged of darkness and lightning descends upon the land, dealing Electro DMG in a small AoE.
For the ability's duration, Oz will continuously attack nearby opponents with Freikugel.
Hold to adjust the location Oz will be summoned to.
Press again any time during the ability's duration to once again summon him to Fischl's side.

skills.title: Midnight Phantasmagoria
skills.description: Summons Oz to spread his twin wings of twilight and defend Fischl.

abilities.description: Has the following properties during the ability's duration:
descriptions: Fischl takes on Oz's form, greatly increasing her Movement Speed.
Strikes nearby opponents with lightning, dealing Electro DMG to opponents she comes into contact with. Each opponent can only be struck once.
Once this ability's effects end, Oz will remain on the battlefield and attack his Prinzessin's foes. If Oz is already on the field, then this will reset the duration of his presence.

passives.title: Mein Hausgarten
passives.description: When dispatched on an expedition in Mondstadt, time consumed is reduced by 25%.

passives.title: Stellar Predator
passives.description: When Fischl hits Oz with a fully-charged Aimed Shot, Oz brings down Thundering Retribution, dealing AoE Electro DMG equal to 152.7% of the arrow's DMG.

passives.title: Undone Be Thy Sinful Hex
passives.description: If your current active character triggers an Electro-related Elemental Reaction when Oz is on the field, the opponent shall be stricken with Thundering Retribution, dealing Electro DMG equal to 80% of Fischl's ATK.

constellations.title: Gaze of the Deep
constellations.description: Even when Oz is not present in combat, he can still watch over Fischl through his raven eyes. When Fischl performs a Normal Attack against an opponent, Oz fires a joint attack, dealing DMG equal to 22% of Fischl's ATK.

constellations.title: Devourer of All Sins
constellations.description: When Nightrider is used, it deals an additional 200% ATK as DMG, and its AoE is increased by 50%.

constellations.title: Wings of Nightmare
constellations.description:
Increases the Level of Nightrider by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.title: Her Pilgrimage of Bleak
constellations.description:
When Midnight Phantasmagoria is used, it deals 222% of ATK as Electro DMG to surrounding opponents.
When the skill duration ends, Fischl regenerates 20% of her HP.

constellations.title: Against the Fleeing Light
constellations.description:
Increases the Level of Midnight Phantasmagoria by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.title: Evernight Raven
constellations.description: Extends the duration of Oz's presence on the field by 2s. Additionally, Oz performs joint attacks with your active character when present, dealing 30% of Fischl's ATK as Electro DMG.

characters.name: Ganyu
characters.title: Plenilune Gaze
characters.description: The secretary at Yuehai Pavilion. The blood of the qilin, an illuminated beast, flows within her veins.

abilities.name: Normal Attack
abilities.description: Perform up to 6 consecutive shots with a bow.

abilities.name: Charged Attack
abilities.description:
Perform a more precise Aimed Shot with increased DMG.
While aiming, an icy aura will accumulate on the arrowhead before the arrow is fired. Has different effects based on how long the energy has been charged:
descriptions: Charge Level 1: Fires off an icy arrow that deals Cryo DMG.
Charge Level 2: Fires off a Frostflake Arrow that deals Cryo DMG. The Frostflake Arrow blooms after hitting its target, dealing AoE Cryo DMG.

abilities.name: Plunging Attack
abilities.description: Fires off a shower of arrows in mid-air before falling and striking the ground, dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

skills.title: Trail of the Qilin
skills.description: Leaving a single Ice Lotus behind, Ganyu dashes backward, shunning all impurity and dealing AoE Cryo DMG.

abilities.name: Ice Lotus
descriptions: Continuously taunts surrounding opponents, attracting them to attack it.
Endurance scales based on Ganyu's Max HP.
Blooms profusely when destroyed or once its duration ends, dealing AoE Cryo DMG.

skills.title: Celestial Shower
skills.description:
Coalesces atmospheric frost and snow to summon a Sacred Cryo Pearl that exorcises evil.
During its ability duration, the Sacred Cryo Pearl will continuously rain down shards of ice, striking opponents within an AoE and dealing Cryo DMG.

passives.title: Preserved for the Hunt
passives.description: Refunds 15% of the ore used when crafting Bow-type weapons.

passives.title: Undivided Heart
passives.description: After firing a Frostflake Arrow, the CRIT Rate of subsequent Frostflake Arrows and their resulting bloom effects is increased by 20% for 5s.

passives.title: Harmony between Heaven and Earth
passives.description: Celestial Shower grants a 20% Cryo DMG Bonus to active party members in the AoE.

constellations.title: Dew-Drinker
constellations.description:
Taking DMG from a Charge Level 2 Frostflake Arrow or Frostflake Arrow Bloom decreases opponents' Cryo RES by 15% for 6s.
A hit regenerates 2 Energy for Ganyu. This effect can only occur once per Charge Level 2 Frostflake Arrow, regardless if Frostflake Arrow itself or its Bloom hit the target.

constellations.title: The Auspicious
constellations.description: Trail of the Qilin gains 1 additional charge.

constellations.title: Cloud-Strider
constellations.description:
Increases the Level of Celestial Shower by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.title: Westward Sojourn
constellations.description:
Opponents standing within the AoE of Celestial Shower take increased DMG. This effect strengthens over time.
Increased DMG taken begins at 5% and increases by 5% every 3s, up to a maximum of 25%.
The effect lingers for 3s after the opponent leaves the AoE.

constellations.title: The Merciful
constellations.description:
Increases the Level of Trail of the Qilin by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.title: The Clement
constellations.description: Using Trail of the Qilin causes the next Frostflake Arrow shot within 30s to not require charging.

characters.name: Gorou
characters.title: Canine Warrior
characters.description: The great general of Watatsumi Island's forces. He is deeply trusted by his subordinates.

abilities.name: Normal Attack
abilities.description: Perform up to 4 consecutive shots with a bow.

abilities.name: Charged Attack
abilities.description:
Perform a more precise Aimed Shot with increased DMG.
While aiming, stone crystals will accumulate on the arrowhead. A fully charged crystalline arrow will deal Geo DMG.

abilities.name: Plunging Attack
abilities.description: Fires off a shower of arrows in mid-air before falling and striking the ground, dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

skills.title: Inuzaka All-Round Defense
skills.description: Deals AoE Geo DMG and sets up a General's War Banner.

abilities.name: General's War Banner
abilities.description: Provides up to 3 buffs to active characters within the skill's AoE based on the number of Geo characters in the party at the time of casting:
descriptions: 1 Geo character: Adds "Standing Firm" - DEF Bonus.
2 Geo characters: Adds "Impregnable" - Increased resistance to interruption.
3 Geo characters: Adds "Crunch" - Geo DMG Bonus.

Gorou can deploy only 1 General's War Banner on the field at any one time. Characters can only benefit from 1 General's War Banner at a time. When a party member leaves the field, the active buff will last for 2s.

abilities.name: Hold
abilities.description: Adjust the location of the skill.

skills.title: Juuga: Forward Unto Victory
skills.description: Displaying his valor as a general, Gorou deals AoE Geo DMG and creates a field known as General's Glory to embolden his comrades.

abilities.name: General's Glory
abilities.description: This field has the following properties:
descriptions: Like the General's War Banner created by Inuzaka All-Round Defense, provides buffs to active characters within the skill's AoE based on the number of Geo characters in the party. Also moves together with your active character.
Generates 1 Crystal Collapse every 1.5s that deals AoE Geo DMG to 1 opponent within the skill's AoE.
Pulls 1 elemental shard in the skill's AoE to your active character's position every 1.5s (elemental shards are created by Crystallize reactions).

If a General's War Banner created by Gorou currently exists on the field when this ability is used, it will be destroyed. In addition, for the duration of General's Glory, Gorou's Elemental Skill "Inuzaka All-Round Defense" will not create the General's War Banner.
If Gorou falls, the effects of General's Glory will be cleared.

passives.title: Seeker of Shinies
passives.description: Displays the location of nearby resources unique to Inazuma on the mini-map.

passives.title: Heedless of the Wind and Weather
passives.description: After using Juuga: Forward Unto Victory, all nearby party members' DEF is increased by 25% for 12s.

passives.title: A Favor Repaid
passives.description: Gorou receives the following DMG Bonuses to his attacks based on his DEF:
descriptions: Inuzaka All-Round Defense: Skill DMG increased by 156% of DEF
Juuga: Forward Unto Victory: Skill DMG and Crystal Collapse DMG increased by 15.6% of DEF

constellations.title: Rushing Hound: Swift as the Wind
constellations.description:
When characters (other than Gorou) within the AoE of Gorou's General's War Banner or General's Glory deal Geo DMG to opponents, the CD of Gorou's Inuzaka All-Round Defense is decreased by 2s.
This effect can occur once every 10s.

constellations.title: Sitting Hound: Steady as a Clock
constellations.description:
While General's Glory is in effect, its duration is extended by 1s when a nearby active character obtains an Elemental Shard from a Crystallize reaction. 
This effect can occur once every 0.1s. Max extension is 3s.

constellations.title: Mauling Hound: Fierce as Fire
constellations.description:
Increases the Level of Inuzaka All-Round Defense by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.title: Lapping Hound: Warm as Water
constellations.description: When General's Glory is in the "Impregnable" or "Crunch" states, it will also heal active characters within its AoE by 50% of Gorou's own DEF every 1.5s.

constellations.title: Striking Hound: Thunderous Force
constellations.description:
Increases the Level of Juuga: Forward Unto Victory by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.title: Valiant Hound: Mountainous Fealty
constellations.description: For 12s after using Inuzaka All-Round Defense or Juuga: Forward Unto Victory, increases the CRIT DMG of all nearby party members' Geo DMG based on the buff level of the skill's field at the time of use:
descriptions: "Standing Firm": +10%
"Impregnable": +20%
"Crunch": +40%
This effect cannot stack and will take reference from the last instance of the effect that is triggered.

characters.name: Hu Tao
characters.title: Fragrance in Thaw
characters.description: The 77th Director of the Wangsheng Funeral Parlor. She took over the business at a rather young age.

abilities.name: Normal Attack
abilities.description: Performs up to six consecutive spear strikes.

abilities.name: Charged Attack
abilities.description: Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to lunge forward, dealing damage to opponents along the way.

abilities.name: Plunging Attack
abilities.description: Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

skills.title: Guide to Afterlife
skills.description:
Only an unwavering flame can cleanse the impurities of this world.
Hu Tao consumes a set portion of her HP to knock the surrounding enemies back and enter the Paramita Papilio state.

abilities.name: Paramita Papilio
descriptions: Increases Hu Tao's ATK based on her Max HP at the time of entering this state. ATK Bonus gained this way cannot exceed 400% of Hu Tao's Base ATK.
Converts attack DMG to Pyro DMG, which cannot be overridden by any other elemental infusion.
Charged Attacks apply the Blood Blossom effect to the enemies hit.
Increases Hu Tao's resistance to interruption.

abilities.name: Blood Blossom
abilities.description:
Enemies affected by Blood Blossom will take Pyro DMG every 4s. This DMG is considered Elemental Skill DMG.
Each enemy can be affected by only one Blood Blossom effect at a time, and its duration may only be refreshed by Hu Tao herself.
Paramita Papilio ends when its duration is over, or Hu Tao has left the battlefield or fallen.

skills.title: Spirit Soother
skills.description:
Commands a blazing spirit to attack, dealing Pyro DMG in a large AoE.
Upon striking the enemy, regenerates a percentage of Hu Tao's Max HP. This effect can be triggered up to 5 times, based on the number of enemies hit.
If Hu Tao's HP is below or equal to 50% when the enemy is hit, both the DMG and HP Regeneration are increased.
stats: Low HP Skill Regeneration|{param4}% Max HP

passives.title: The More the Merrier
passives.description: When Hu Tao cooks a dish perfectly, she has a 18% chance to receive an additional "Suspicious" dish of the same type.

passives.title: Flutter By
passives.description: When a Paramita Papilio state activated by Guide to Afterlife ends, all allies in the party (excluding Hu Tao herself) will have their CRIT Rate increased by 12% for 8s.

passives.title: Sanguine Rouge
passives.description: When Hu Tao's HP is equal to or less than 50%, her Pyro DMG Bonus is increased by 33%.

constellations.title: Crimson Bouquet
constellations.description: While in a Paramita Papilio state activated by Guide to Afterlife, Hu Tao's Charge Attacks do not consume Stamina.

constellations.title: Ominous Rainfall
constellations.description:
Increases the Blood Blossom DMG by an amount equal to 10% of Hu Tao's Max HP at the time the effect is applied.
Additionally, Spirit Soother will also apply the Blood Blossom effect.

constellations.title: Lingering Carmine
constellations.description:
Increases the Level of Guide to Afterlife by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.title: Garden of Eternal Rest
constellations.description: Upon defeating an enemy affected by a Blood Blossom that Hu Tao applied herself, all nearby allies in the party (excluding Hu Tao herself) will have their CRIT Rate increased by 12% for 15s.

constellations.title: Floral Incense
constellations.description:
Increases the Level of Spirit Soother by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.title: Butterfly's Embrace
constellations.description: Triggers when Hu Tao's HP drops below 25%, or when she suffers a lethal strike:
descriptions: Hu Tao will not fall as a result of the DMG sustained. Additionally, for the next 10s, all of her Elemental and Physical RES is increased by 200%, her CRIT Rate is increased by 100%, and her resistance to interruption is greatly increased.
This effect triggers automatically when Hu Tao has 1 HP left.
Can only occur once every 60s.

characters.name: Jean
characters.title: Dandelion Knight
characters.description: The righteous and rigorous Dandelion Knight, and Acting Grand Master of Mondstadt's Knights of Favonius.

abilities.name: Normal Attack
abilities.description: Performs up to 5 consecutive strikes.

abilities.name: Charged Attack
abilities.description:
Consumes a certain amount of stamina to launch an opponent using the power of wind.
Launched opponents will slowly fall to the ground.

abilities.name: Plunging Attack
abilities.description: Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

skills.title: Gale Blade
skills.description: Focusing the might of the formless wind around her blade, Jean releases a miniature storm, launching opponents in the direction she aims at, dealing massive Anemo DMG.

abilities.name: Hold
abilities.description:
At the cost of continued stamina consumption, Jean can command the whirlwind to pull surrounding opponents and objects towards her front.
Direction can be adjusted.
Character is immobile during skill duration.

skills.title: Dandelion Breeze
skills.description:
Calling upon the wind's protection, Jean creates a swirling Dandelion Field, launching surrounding opponents and dealing Anemo DMG.
At the same time, she instantly regenerates a large amount of HP for all party members. The amount of HP restored scales off Jean's ATK.

abilities.name: Dandelion Field
descriptions: Continuously regenerates HP of characters within the AoE and continuously imbues them with Anemo.
Deals Anemo DMG to opponents entering or exiting the Dandelion Field.

passives.title: Guiding Breeze
passives.description: When a Perfect Cooking is achieved on a dish with restorative effects, there is a 12% chance to obtain double the product.

passives.title: Wind Companion
passives.description: On hit, Jean's Normal Attacks have a 50% chance to regenerate HP equal to 15% of Jean's ATK for all party members.

passives.title: Let the Wind Lead
passives.description: Using Dandelion Breeze will regenerate 20% of its Energy.

constellations.title: Spiraling Tempest
constellations.description: Increases the pulling speed of Gale Blade after holding for more than 1s, and increases the DMG dealt by 40%.

constellations.title: People's Aegis
constellations.description: When Jean picks up an Elemental Orb/Particle, all party members have their Movement SPD and ATK SPD increased by 15% for 15s.

constellations.title: When the West Wind Arises
constellations.description:
Increases the Level of Dandelion Breeze by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.title: Lands of Dandelion
constellations.description: Within the Field created by Dandelion Breeze, all opponents have their Anemo RES decreased by 40%.

constellations.title: Outbursting Gust
constellations.description:
Increases the Level of Gale Blade by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.title: Lion's Fang, Fair Protector of Mondstadt
constellations.description: Incoming DMG is decreased by 35% within the Field created by Dandelion Breeze. Upon leaving the Dandelion Field, this effect lasts for 3 attacks or 10s.

characters.name: Kaedehara Kazuha
characters.title: Scarlet Leaves Pursue Wild Waves
characters.description: A wandering samurai from Inazuma who is currently with Liyue's Crux Fleet. A gentle and carefree soul whose heart hides a great many burdens from the past.

abilities.name: Normal Attack
abilities.description: Perform up to 5 rapid strikes.

abilities.name: Charged Attack
abilities.description: Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to unleash 2 rapid sword strikes.

abilities.name: Plunging Attack
abilities.description: Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact. If this Plunging Attack is triggered by Chihayaburu, it will be converted to Plunging Attack: Midare Ranzan.

abilities.name: Plunging Attack: Midare Ranzan
abilities.description: When a Plunging Attack is performed using the effects of the Elemental Skill Chihayaburu, Plunging Attack DMG is converted to Anemo DMG and will create a small wind tunnel via a secret blade technique that pulls in nearby objects and opponents.

skills.title: Chihayaburu
skills.description:
Unleashes a secret technique as fierce as the rushing wind that pulls objects and opponents towards Kazuha's current position before launching opponents within the AoE, dealing Anemo DMG and lifting Kazuha into the air on a rushing gust of wind.
Within 10s of remaining airborne after casting Chihayaburu, Kazuha can unleash a powerful Plunging Attack known as Midare Ranzan.

abilities.name: Press
abilities.description: Can be used in mid-air.

abilities.name: Hold
abilities.description: Charges up before unleashing greater Anemo DMG over a larger AoE than Press Mode.

abilities.name: Plunging Attack: Midare Ranzan
abilities.description:
When a Plunging Attack is performed using the effects of the Elemental Skill Chihayaburu, Plunging Attack DMG is converted to Anemo DMG. On landing, Kazuha creates a small wind tunnel via a secret blade technique that pulls in nearby objects and opponents.
Midare Ranzan's DMG is considered Plunging Attack DMG.

skills.title: Kazuha Slash
skills.description:
The signature technique of Kazuha's self-styled bladework — a single slash that strikes with the force of the first winds of autumn, dealing AoE Anemo DMG.
The blade's passage will leave behind a field named "Autumn Whirlwind" that periodically deals AoE Anemo DMG to opponents within its range.

abilities.name: Elemental Absorption
abilities.description:
If Autumn Whirlwind comes into contact with Hydro/Pyro/Cryo/Electro, it will deal additional elemental DMG of that type.
Elemental Absorption may only occur once per use.

passives.title: Cloud Strider
passives.description:
Decreases sprinting Stamina consumption for your own party members by 20%.
Not stackable with Passive Talents that provide the exact same effects.

passives.title: Soumon Swordsmanship
passives.description:
If Chihayaburu comes into contact with Hydro/Pyro/Cryo/Electro when cast, Chihayaburu will absorb that element and if Plunging Attack: Midare Ranzan is used before the effect expires, it will deal an additional 200% ATK of the absorbed elemental type as DMG. This will be considered Plunging Attack DMG.
Elemental Absorption may only occur once per use of Chihayaburu.

passives.title: Poetics of Fuubutsu
passives.description: Upon triggering a Swirl reaction, Kaedehara Kazuha will grant all party members a 0.04% Elemental DMG Bonus to the element absorbed by Swirl for every point of Elemental Mastery he has for 8s. Bonuses for different elements obtained through this method can co-exist.

constellations.title: Scarlet Hills
constellations.description:
Decreases Chihayaburu's CD by 10%.
Using Kazuha Slash resets the CD of Chihayaburu.

constellations.title: Yamaarashi Tailwind
constellations.description: The Autumn Whirlwind field created by Kazuha Slash has the following effects:
descriptions: Increases Kaedehara Kazuha's own Elemental Mastery by 200.
Increases the Elemental Mastery of characters within the field by 200.
The Elemental Mastery-increasing effects of this Constellation do not stack.

constellations.title: Maple Monogatari
constellations.description:
Increases the Level of Chihayaburu by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.title: Oozora Genpou
constellations.description: When Kaedehara Kazuha's Energy is lower than 45, he obtains the following effects:
descriptions: Pressing or Holding Chihayaburu regenerates 3 or 4 Energy for Kaedehara Kazuha, respectively.
When gliding, Kaedehara Kazuha regenerates 2 Energy per second.

constellations.title: Wisdom of Bansei
constellations.description:
Increases the Level of Kazuha Slash by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.title: Crimson Momiji
constellations.description: After using Chihayaburu or Kazuha Slash, Kaedehara Kazuha gains an Anemo Infusion for 5s. Additionally, each point of Elemental Mastery will increase the DMG dealt by Kaedehara Kazuha's Normal, Charged, and Plunging Attack by 0.2%.

characters.name: Kaeya
characters.title: Frostwind Swordsman
characters.description: An accomplished swordsman and a strategic thinker in the Knights of Favonius, rumored to hail from beyond Mondstadt.

abilities.name: Normal Attack
abilities.description: Perform up to 5 rapid strikes.

abilities.name: Charged Attack
abilities.description: Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to unleash 2 rapid sword strikes.

abilities.name: Plunging Attack
abilities.description: Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

skills.title: Frostgnaw
skills.description: Unleashes a frigid blast, dealing Cryo DMG to opponents in front of Kaeya.

skills.title: Glacial Waltz
skills.description:
Coalescing the frost in the air, Kaeya summons 3 icicles that revolve around him.
These icicles will follow the character around and deal Cryo DMG to opponents in their path for the ability's duration.

passives.title: Hidden Strength
passives.description:
Decreases sprinting Stamina consumption for your own party members by 20%.
Not stackable with Passive Talents that provide the exact same effects.

passives.title: Cold-Blooded Strike
passives.description: Every hit with Frostgnaw regenerates HP for Kaeya equal to 15% of his ATK.

passives.title: Glacial Heart
passives.description:
Opponents Frozen by Frostgnaw will drop additional Elemental Particles.
Frostgnaw may only produce a maximum of 2 additional Elemental Particles per use.

constellations.title: Excellent Blood
constellations.description: The CRIT Rate of Kaeya's Normal and Charge Attacks against opponents affected by Cryo is increased by 15%.

constellations.title: Never-Ending Performance
constellations.description: Every time Glacial Waltz defeats an opponent during its duration, its duration is increased by 2.5s, up to a maximum of 15s.

constellations.title: Dance of Frost
constellations.description:
Increases the Level of Frostgnaw by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.title: Frozen Kiss
constellations.description: Triggers automatically when Kaeya's HP falls below 20%:
descriptions: Creates a shield that absorbs damage equal to 30% of Kaeya's Max HP. Lasts for 20s.
This shield absorbs Cryo DMG with 250% efficiency.
Can only occur once every 60s.

constellations.title: Frostbiting Embrace
constellations.description:
Increases the Level of Glacial Waltz by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.title: Glacial Whirlwind
constellations.description: Glacial Waltz will generate 1 additional icicle, and will regenerate 15 Energy when cast.

characters.name: Kamisato Ayaka
characters.title: Frostflake Heron
characters.description: Daughter of the Yashiro Commission's Kamisato Clan. Dignified and elegant, as well as wise and strong.

abilities.name: Normal Attack
abilities.description: Performs up to 5 rapid strikes.

abilities.name: Charged Attack
abilities.description: Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to unleash a flurry of sword ki.

abilities.name: Plunging Attack
abilities.description: Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging enemies along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

skills.title: Kamisato Art: Hyouka
skills.description: Summons blooming ice to launch nearby opponents, dealing AoE Cryo DMG.

abilities.name: Alternate Sprint
abilities.description:
Ayaka consumes Stamina and cloaks herself in a frozen fog that moves with her.
In Senho form, she moves swiftly upon water.
When she reappears, the following effects occur:
descriptions: Ayaka unleashes frigid energy to apply Cryo on nearby opponents.
Coldness condenses around Ayaka's blade, infusing her attacks with Cryo for a brief period.

skills.title: Kamisato Art: Soumetsu
skills.description: Summons forth a snowstorm with flawless poise, unleashing a Frostflake Seki no To that moves forward continuously.

abilities.name: Frostflake Seki no To
descriptions: A storm of whirling icy winds that slashes repeatedly at every enemy it touches, dealing Cryo DMG.
The snowstorm explodes after its duration ends, dealing AoE Cryo DMG.

passives.title: Fruits of Shinsa
passives.description: When Ayaka crafts Weapon Ascension Materials, she has a 10% chance to receive double the product.

passives.title: Amatsumi Kunitsumi Sanctification
passives.description: After using Kamisato Art: Hyouka, Kamisato Ayaka's Normal and Charged Attacks deal 30% increased DMG for 6s.

passives.title: Kanten Senmyou Blessing
passives.description: When the Cryo application at the end of Kamisato Art: Senho hits an opponent, Kamisato Ayaka gains the following effects:
descriptions: Restores 10 Stamina
Gains 18% Cryo DMG Bonus for 10s.

constellations.title: Snowswept Sakura
constellations.description: When Kamisato Ayaka's Normal or Charged Attacks deal Cryo DMG to opponents, it has a 50% chance of decreasing the CD of Kamisato Art: Hyouka by 0.3s. This effect can occur once every 0.1s.

constellations.title: Blizzard Blade Seki no To
constellations.description: When casting Kamisato Art: Soumetsu, unleashes 2 smaller additional Frostflake Seki no To, each dealing 20% of the original storm's DMG.

constellations.title: Frostbloom Kamifubuki
constellations.description:
Increases the Level of Kamisato Art: Soumetsu by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.title: Ebb and Flow
constellations.description: Opponents damaged by Kamisato Art: Soumetsu's Frostflake Seki no To will have their DEF decreased by 30% for 6s.

constellations.title: Blossom Cloud Irutsuki
constellations.description:
Increases the Level of Kamisato Art: Hyouka by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.title: Dance of Suigetsu
constellations.description: Kamisato Ayaka gains Usurahi Butou every 10s, increasing her Charged Attack DMG by 298%. This buff will be cleared 0.5s after Ayaka's Charged ATK hits an opponent, after which the timer for this ability will restart.

characters.name: Kamisato Ayato
characters.description: The young but highly accomplished head of the Yashiro Commision's Kamisato Clan. Cultured and polite, he is a man of many ways and means.

characters.name: Keqing
characters.title: Driving Thunder
characters.description: The Yuheng of the Liyue Qixing. Keqing has much to say about Rex Lapis's unilateral approach to policymaking in Liyue — but in truth, gods admire skeptics such as her quite a lot.

abilities.name: Normal Attack
abilities.description: Perform up to 5 rapid strikes.

abilities.name: Charged Attack
abilities.description: Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to unleash 2 rapid sword strikes.

abilities.name: Plunging Attack
abilities.description: Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

skills.title: Stellar Restoration
skills.description:
Hurls a Lightning Stiletto that annihilates her opponents like the swift thunder.
When the Stiletto hits its target, it deals Electro DMG to opponents in a small AoE, and places a Stiletto Mark on the spot hit.

abilities.name: Hold
abilities.description:
Hold to adjust the direction in which the Stiletto shall be thrown.
Stilettos thrown by the Hold attack mode can be suspended in mid-air, allowing Keqing to jump to them when using Stellar Restoration a second time.

abilities.name: Lightning Stiletto
abilities.description: If Keqing uses Stellar Restoration again or uses a Charged Attack while its duration lasts, it will clear the Stiletto Mark and produce different effects:
descriptions: If she uses Stellar Restoration again, she will blink to the location of the Mark and unleash one slashing attack that deals AoE Electro DMG. When blinking to a Stiletto that was thrown from a Holding attack, Keqing can leap across obstructing terrain.
If Keqing uses a Charged Attack, she will ignite a series of thundering cuts at the Mark's location, dealing AoE Electro DMG.

skills.title: Starward Sword
skills.description:
Keqing unleashes the power of lightning, dealing Electro DMG in an AOE.
She then blends into the shadow of her blade, striking a series of thunderclap-blows to nearby opponents simultaneously that deal multiple instances of Electro DMG. The final attack deals massive AoE Electro DMG.

passives.title: Land's Overseer
passives.description: When dispatched on an expedition in Liyue, time consumed is reduced by 25%.

passives.title: Thundering Penance
passives.description: After recasting Stellar Restoration while a Lightning Stiletto is present, Keqing's weapon gains an Electro Infusion for 5s.

passives.title: Aristocratic Dignity
passives.description: When casting Starward Sword, Keqing's CRIT Rate is increased by 15%, and her Energy Recharge is increased by 15%. This effect lasts for 8s.

constellations.title: Thundering Might
constellations.description: Recasting Stellar Restoration while a Lightning Stiletto is present causes Keqing to deal 50% of her ATK as AoE Electro DMG at the start point and terminus of her Blink.

constellations.title: Keen Extraction
constellations.description:
When Keqing's Normal and Charged Attacks hit opponents affected by Electro, they have a 50% chance of producing an Elemental Particle.
This effect can only occur once every 5s.

constellations.title: Foreseen Reformation
constellations.description:
Increases the Level of Starward Sword by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.title: Attunement
constellations.description: For 10s after Keqing triggers an Electro-related Elemental Reaction, her ATK is increased by 25%.

constellations.title: Beckoning Stars
constellations.description:
Increases the Level of Stellar Restoration by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.title: Tenacious Star
constellations.description:
When initiating a Normal Attack, a Charged Attack, Elemental Skill or Elemental Burst, Keqing gains a 6% Electro DMG Bonus for 8s.
Effects triggered by Normal Attacks, Charged Attacks, Elemental Skills and Elemental Bursts are considered independent entities.

characters.name: Klee
characters.title: Fleeing Sunlight
characters.description: An explosives expert and a regular at the Knights of Favonius's confinement room. Also known as Fleeing Sunlight.

abilities.name: Normal Attack
abilities.description: Throws things that go boom when they hit things! Perform up to 3 explosive attacks, dealing AoE Pyro DMG.

abilities.name: Charged Attack
abilities.description: Consumes a certain amount of Stamina and deals AoE Pyro DMG to opponents after a short casting time.

abilities.name: Plunging Attack
abilities.description: Gathering the power of Pyro, Klee plunges towards the ground from mid-air, damaging all opponents in her path. Deals AoE Pyro DMG upon impact with the ground.

skills.title: Jumpy Dumpty
skills.description:
Jumpy Dumpty is tons of boom-bang-fun! 
When thrown, Jumpy Dumpty bounces thrice, igniting and dealing AoE Pyro DMG with every bounce.
On the third bounce, the bomb splits into many mines.
The mines will explode upon contact with opponents, or after a short period of time, dealing AoE Pyro DMG.
Starts with 2 charges.

skills.title: Sparks 'n' Splash
skills.description: Klee's Blazing Delight! For the duration of this ability, continuously summons Sparks 'n' Splash to attack nearby opponents, dealing AoE Pyro DMG.

passives.title: All Of My Treasures!
passives.description: Displays the location of nearby resources unique to Mondstadt on the mini-map.

passives.title: Pounding Surprise
passives.description:
When Jumpy Dumpty and Normal Attacks deal DMG, Klee has a 50% chance to obtain an Explosive Spark.
This Explosive Spark is consumed by the next Charged Attack, which costs no Stamina and deals 50% increased DMG.

passives.title: Sparkling Burst
passives.description: When Klee's Charged Attack results in a CRIT Hit, all party members gain 2 Elemental Energy.

constellations.title: Chained Reactions
constellations.description: Attacks and Skills have a certain chance to summon sparks that bombard opponents, dealing DMG equal to 120% of Sparks 'n' Splash's DMG.

constellations.title: Explosive Frags
constellations.description: Being hit by Jumpy Dumpty's mines decreases opponents' DEF by 23% for 10s.

constellations.title: Exquisite Compound
constellations.description:
Increases the Level of Jumpy Dumpty by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.title: Sparkly Explosion
constellations.description: If Klee leaves the field during the duration of Sparks 'n' Splash, her departure triggers an explosion that deals 555% of her ATK as AoE Pyro DMG.

constellations.title: Nova Burst
constellations.description:
Increases the Level of Sparks 'n' Splash by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.title: Blazing Delight
constellations.description:
While under the effects of Sparks 'n' Splash, Klee will regenerate 3 Energy for all members of the party (excluding Klee) every 3s.
When Sparks 'n' Splash is used, all party members will gain a 10% Pyro DMG Bonus for 25s.

characters.name: Kujou Sara
characters.title: Crowfeather Kaburaya
characters.description: A general of the Tenryou Commission. Bold, decisive, and skilled in battle.

abilities.name: Normal Attack
abilities.description: Perform up to 5 consecutive shots with a bow.

abilities.name: Charged Attack
abilities.description:
Perform a more precise Aimed Shot with increased DMG.
While aiming, crackling lightning will accumulate on the arrowhead. An arrow fully charged with the storm's might will deal Electro DMG.
When in the Crowfeather Cover state, a fully-charged arrow will leave a Crowfeather behind after it hits.

abilities.name: Plunging Attack
abilities.description: Fires off a shower of arrows in mid-air before falling and striking the ground, dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

skills.title: Tengu Stormcall
skills.description:
Retreats rapidly with the speed of a tengu, summoning the protection of the Crowfeather.
Gains Crowfeather Cover for 18s, and when Kujou Sara fires a fully-charged Aimed Shot, Crowfeather Cover will be consumed, and will leave a Crowfeather at the target location.
Crowfeathers will trigger Tengu Juurai: Ambush after a short time, dealing Electro DMG and granting the active character within its AoE an ATK Bonus based on Kujou Sara's Base ATK.
The ATK Bonuses from different Tengu Juurai will not stack, and their effects and duration will be determined by the last Tengu Juurai to take effect.

skills.title: Subjugation: Koukou Sendou
skills.description:
Casts down Tengu Juurai: Titanbreaker, dealing AoE Electro DMG. Afterwards, Tengu Juurai: Titanbreaker spreads out into 4 consecutive bouts of Tengu Juurai: Stormcluster, dealing AoE Electro DMG.
Tengu Juurai: Titanbreaker and Tengu Juurai: Stormcluster can provide the active character within their AoE with the same ATK Bonus as given by the Elemental Skill, Tengu Stormcall.
The ATK Bonus provided by various kinds of Tengu Juurai will not stack, and their effects and duration will be determined by the last Tengu Juurai to take effect.

passives.title: Land Survey
passives.description: When dispatched on an expedition in Inazuma, time consumed is reduced by 25%.

passives.title: Immovable Will
passives.description: While in the Crowfeather Cover state provided by Tengu Stormcall, Aimed Shot charge times are decreased by 60%.

passives.title: Decorum
passives.description: When Tengu Juurai: Ambush hits opponents, Kujou Sara will restore 1.2 Energy to all party members for every 100% Energy Recharge she has. This effect can be triggered once every 3s.

constellations.title: Crow's Eye
constellations.description:
When Tengu Juurai grant characters ATK Bonuses or hits opponents, the CD of Tengu Stormcall is decreased by 1s.
This effect can be triggered once every 3s.

constellations.title: Dark Wings
constellations.description: Unleashing Tengu Stormcall will leave a weaker Crowfeather at Kujou Sara's original position that will deal 30% of its original DMG.

constellations.title: The War Within
constellations.description:
Increases the Level of Subjugation: Koukou Sendou by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.title: Conclusive Proof
constellations.description: The number of Tengu Juurai: Stormcluster released by Subjugation: Koukou Sendou is increased to 6.

constellations.title: Spellsinger
constellations.description:
Increases the Level of Tengu Stormcall by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.title: Sin of Pride
constellations.description: The Electro DMG of characters who have had their ATK increased by Tengu Juurai has its Crit DMG increased by 60%.

characters.name: Lisa
characters.title: Witch of Purple Rose
characters.description: The languid but knowledgeable Librarian of the Knights of Favonius, deemed by Sumeru Academia to be their most distinguished graduate in the past two centuries.
