abilities.name: Normal Attack
abilities.description: Perform up to 4 lightning attacks that deal Electro DMG.

abilities.name: Charged Attack
abilities.description: Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to deal AoE Electro DMG after a short casting time.

abilities.name: Plunging Attack
abilities.description: Gathering the might of Electro, Lisa plunges towards the ground from mid-air, damaging all opponents in her path. Deals AoE Electro DMG upon impact with the ground.

skills.title: Violet Arc
skills.description: Channels the power of lightning to sweep bothersome matters away.

abilities.name: Press
abilities.description:
Releases a homing Lightning Orb.
On hit, it deals Electro DMG and applies a stack of the Conductive status (max 3 stacks) to opponents in a small AoE.

abilities.name: Hold
abilities.description:
After an extended casting time, calls down lightning from the heavens, dealing massive Electro DMG to all nearby opponents.
Deals great amounts of extra damage to opponents based on the number of Conductive stacks applied to them, and clears their Conductive status.

skills.title: Lightning Rose
skills.description:
Summons a Lightning Rose that unleashes powerful lightning bolts, launching surrounding opponents and dealing Electro DMG.
The Lightning Rose will continuously emit lightning to knock back opponents and deal Electro DMG throughout the ability's duration.

passives.title: General Pharmaceutics
passives.description: When Lisa crafts a potion, she has a 20% chance to refund a portion of the crafting materials used.

passives.title: Induced Aftershock
passives.description: Hits by Charged Attacks apply Violet Arc's Conductive status to opponents.

passives.title: Static Electricity Field
passives.description: Opponents hit by Lightning Rose have their DEF decreased by 15% for 10s.

constellations.title: Infinite Circuit
constellations.description:
Lisa regenerates 2 Energy for every opponent hit while holding Violet Arc.
A maximum of 10 Energy can be regenerated in this manner at any one time.

constellations.title: Electromagnetic Field
constellations.description: Holding Violet Arc has the following effects:
descriptions: Increases DEF by 25%.
Increases Lisa's resistance to interruption.

constellations.title: Resonant Thunder
constellations.description:
Increases the Level of Lightning Rose by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.title: Plasma Eruption
constellations.description: Increases the number of lightning bolts released by Lightning Rose by 1-3.

constellations.title: Electrocute
constellations.description:
Increases the Level of Violet Arc by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.title: Pulsating Witch
constellations.description:
When Lisa takes the field, she applies 3 stacks of Violet Arc's Conductive status onto nearby opponents.
This effect can only occur once every 5s.

characters.name: Mona
characters.title: Astral Reflection
characters.description: A mysterious young astrologer who proclaims herself to be "Astrologist Mona Megistus," and who possesses abilities to match the title. Erudite, but prideful.

abilities.name: Normal Attack
abilities.description: Perform up to 4 water splash attacks that deal Hydro DMG.

abilities.name: Charged Attack
abilities.description: Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to deal AoE Hydro DMG after a short casting time.

abilities.name: Plunging Attack
abilities.description: Gathering the might of Hydro, Mona plunges towards the ground from mid-air, damaging all opponents in her path. Deals AoE Hydro DMG upon impact with the ground.

skills.title: Mirror Reflection of Doom
skills.description: Creates an illusory Phantom of Fate from coalesced waterspouts.

abilities.description: The Phantom has the following special properties:
descriptions: Continuously taunts nearby opponents, attracting their fire.
Continuously deals Hydro DMG to nearby opponents.
When its duration expires, the Phantom explodes, dealing AoE Hydro DMG.

abilities.name: Hold
abilities.description:
Utilizes water currents to move backwards swiftly before conjuring a Phantom.
Only one Phantom created by Mirror Reflection of Doom can exist at any time.

abilities.name: Alternate Sprint
abilities.description:
Mona cloaks herself within the water's flow, consuming Stamina to move rapidly.
When under the effect of Illusory Torrent, Mona can move at high speed on water.
Applies the Wet status to nearby opponents when she reappears.

skills.title: Stellaris Phantasm
skills.description: Mona summons the sparkling waves and creates a reflection of the starry sky, applying the Illusory Bubble status to opponents in a large AoE.

abilities.name: Illusory Bubble
abilities.description:
Traps opponents inside a pocket of destiny and also makes them Wet. Renders weaker opponents immobile.
When an opponent affected by Illusory Bubble sustains DMG, it has the following effects:
descriptions: Applies an Omen to the opponent, which gives a DMG Bonus, also increasing the DMG of the attack that causes it.
Removes the Illusory Bubble, dealing Hydro DMG in the process.

abilities.name: Omen
abilities.description: During its duration, increases DMG taken by opponents.

passives.title: Principium of Astrology
passives.description: When Mona crafts Weapon Ascension Materials, she has a 25% chance to refund a portion of the crafting materials used.

passives.title: "Come 'n' Get Me, Hag!"
passives.description:
After she has used Illusory Torrent for 2s, if there are any opponents nearby, Mona will automatically create a Phantom.
A Phantom created in this manner lasts for 2s, and its explosion DMG is equal to 50% of Mirror Reflection of Doom.

passives.title: Waterborne Destiny
passives.description: Increases Mona's Hydro DMG Bonus by a degree equivalent to 20% of her Energy Recharge rate.

constellations.title: Prophecy of Submersion
constellations.description: When any of your own party members hits an opponent affected by an Omen, the effects of Hydro-related Elemental Reactions are enhanced for 8s:
descriptions: Electro-Charged DMG increases by 15%.
Vaporize DMG increases by 15%.
Hydro Swirl DMG increases by 15%.
Frozen duration is extended by 15%.

constellations.title: Lunar Chain
constellations.description:
When a Normal Attack hits, there is a 20% chance that it will be automatically followed by a Charged Attack.
This effect can only occur once every 5s.

constellations.title: Restless Revolution
constellations.description:
Increases the Level of Stellaris Phantasm by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.title: Prophecy of Oblivion
constellations.description: When any party member attacks an opponent affected by an Omen, their CRIT Rate is increased by 15%.

constellations.title: Mockery of Fortuna
constellations.description:
Increases the Level of Mirror Reflection of Doom by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.title: Rhetorics of Calamitas
constellations.description:
Upon entering Illusory Torrent, Mona gains a 60% increase to the DMG of her next Charged Attack per second of movement.
A maximum DMG Bonus of 180% can be achieved in this manner. The effect lasts for no more than 8s.

characters.name: Ningguang
characters.title: Eclipsing Star
characters.description: The Tianquan of the Liyue Qixing. Her wealth is unsurpassed in all of Teyvat.

abilities.name: Normal Attack
abilities.description:
Shoots gems that deal Geo DMG.
Upon hit, this grants Ningguang 1 Star Jade.

abilities.name: Charged Attack
abilities.description:
Consumes a certain amount of stamina to fire off a giant gem that deals Geo DMG.
If Ningguang has any Star Jades, unleashing a Charged Attack will cause the Star Jades to be fired at the enemy as well, dealing additional DMG.

abilities.name: Plunging Attack
abilities.description: Gathering the might of Geo, Ningguang plunges towards the ground from mid-air, damaging all opponents in her path. Deals AoE Geo DMG upon impact with the ground.

skills.title: Jade Screen
skills.description: Ningguang creates a Jade Screen out of gold, obsidian and her great opulence, dealing AoE Geo DMG.

abilities.name: Jade Screen
descriptions: Blocks opponents' projectiles.
Endurance scales based on Ningguang's Max HP.
Jade Screen is considered a Geo Construct and can be used to block certain attacks, but cannot be climbed. Only one Jade Screen may exist at any one time.

skills.title: Starshatter
skills.description:
Gathering a great number of gems, Ningguang scatters them all at once, sending homing projectiles at her opponents that deal massive Geo DMG.
If Starshatter is cast when a Jade Screen is nearby, the Jade Screen will fire additional gem projectiles at the same time.

passives.title: Trove of Marvelous Treasures
passives.description: Displays the location of nearby ore veins used in forging on the mini-map.

passives.title: Backup Plan
passives.description: When Ningguang is in possession of Star Jades, her Charged Attack does not consume Stamina.

passives.title: Strategic Reserve
passives.description: A character that passes through the Jade Screen will gain a 12% Geo DMG Bonus for 10s.

constellations.title: Piercing Fragments
constellations.description: When a Normal Attack hits, it deals AoE DMG.

constellations.title: Shock Effect
constellations.description:
When Jade Screen is shattered, its CD will reset.
Can occur once every 6s.

constellations.title: Majesty be the Array of Stars
constellations.description:
Increases the Level of Starshatter by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.title: Exquisite be the Jade, Outshining All Beneath
constellations.description: Jade Screen increases nearby characters' Elemental RES by 10%.

constellations.title: Invincible be the Jade Screen
constellations.description:
Increases the Level of Jade Screen by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.title: Grandeur be the Seven Stars
constellations.description: When Starshatter is used, Ningguang gains 7 Star Jades.

characters.name: Noelle
characters.title: Chivalric Blossom
characters.description: A maid who faithfully serves the Knights of Favonius. She dreams of joining their ranks someday.

abilities.name: Normal Attack
abilities.description: Perform up to 4 consecutive strikes.

abilities.name: Charged Attack
abilities.description:
Drains Stamina over time to perform continuous spinning attacks against all nearby opponents.
At the end of the sequence, perform a more powerful slash.

abilities.name: Plunging Attack
abilities.description: Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

skills.title: Breastplate
skills.description: Summons protective stone armor, dealing Geo DMG to surrounding opponents and creating a shield. The shield's DMG Absorption scales based on Noelle's DEF.

abilities.description: The shield has the following properties:
descriptions: When Noelle's Normal and Charged Attacks hit a target, they have a certain chance to regenerate HP for all characters.
Possesses 150% DMG Absorption efficiency against all Elemental and Physical DMG.
The amount of HP healed when regeneration is triggered scales based on Noelle's DEF.

skills.title: Sweeping Time
skills.description: Gathering the strength of stone around her weapon, Noelle strikes the opponents surrounding her within a large AoE, dealing Geo DMG.

abilities.description: Afterwards, Noelle gains the following effects:
descriptions: Larger attack AoE.
Converts attack DMG to Geo DMG that cannot be overridden by any other elemental infusion.
Increased ATK that scales based on her DEF.

passives.title: Maid's Knighthood
passives.description: When a Perfect Cooking is achieved on a DEF-boosting dish, Noelle has a 12% chance to obtain double the product.

passives.title: Devotion
passives.description: When Noelle is in the party but not on the field, this ability triggers automatically when your active character's HP falls below 30%:
descriptions: Creates a shield for your active character that lasts for 20s and absorbs DMG equal to 400% of Noelle's DEF.
The shield has a 150% DMG Absorption effectiveness against all Elemental and Physical DMG.
This effect can only occur once every 60s.

passives.title: Nice and Clean
passives.description:
Every 4 Normal or Charged Attack hits will decrease the CD of Breastplate by 1s.
Hitting multiple opponents with a single attack is only counted as 1 hit.

constellations.title: I Got Your Back
constellations.description: While Sweeping Time and Breastplate are both in effect, the chance of Breastplate's healing effects activating is increased to 100%.

constellations.title: Combat Maid
constellations.description: Decreases the Stamina Consumption of Noelle's Charged Attacks by 20% and increases her Charged Attack DMG by 15%.

constellations.title: Invulnerable Maid
constellations.description:
Increases the Level of Breastplate by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.title: To Be Cleaned
constellations.description: When Breastplate's duration expires or it is destroyed by DMG, it will deal 400% ATK of Geo DMG to surrounding opponents.

constellations.title: Favonius Sweeper Master
constellations.description:
Increases the Level of Sweeping Time by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.title: Must Be Spotless
constellations.description:
Sweeping Time increases Noelle's ATK by an additional 50% of her DEF.
Additionally, every opponent defeated during the skill's duration adds 1s to the duration, up to 10s.

characters.name: Qiqi
characters.title: Icy Resurrection
characters.description: An apprentice and herb gatherer at Bubu Pharmacy. An undead with a bone-white complexion, she seldom has much in the way of words or emotion.

abilities.name: Normal Attack
abilities.description: Perform up to 5 rapid strikes.

abilities.name: Charged Attack
abilities.description: Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to unleash 2 rapid sword strikes.

abilities.name: Plunging Attack
abilities.description: Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

skills.title: Adeptus Art: Herald of Frost
skills.description: Using the Icevein Talisman, Qiqi brings forth the Herald of Frost, dealing Cryo DMG to surrounding opponents.

abilities.name: Herald of Frost
descriptions: On hit, Qiqi's Normal and Charged Attacks regenerate HP for your own party members and nearby teammates. Healing scales based on Qiqi's ATK.
Periodically regenerates your active character's HP.
Follows the character around, dealing Cryo DMG to opponents in their path.

skills.title: Adeptus Art: Preserver of Fortune
skills.description: Qiqi releases the adeptus power sealed within her body, marking nearby opponents with a Fortune-Preserving Talisman that deals Cryo DMG.

abilities.name: Fortune-Preserving Talisman
abilities.description: When opponents affected by this Talisman take DMG, the character that dealt this DMG regenerates HP.

passives.title: Former Life Memories
passives.description: Displays the location of nearby resources unique to Liyue on the mini-map.

passives.title: Life-Prolonging Methods
passives.description: When a character under the effects of Adeptus Art: Herald of Frost triggers an Elemental Reaction, their Incoming Healing Bonus is increased by 20% for 8s.

passives.title: A Glimpse Into Arcanum
passives.description: When Qiqi hits opponents with her Normal and Charged Attacks, she has a 50% chance to apply a Fortune-Preserving Talisman to them for 6s. This effect can only occur once every 30s.

constellations.title: Ascetics of Frost
constellations.description: When the Herald of Frost hits an opponent marked by a Fortune-Preserving Talisman, Qiqi regenerates 2 Energy.

constellations.title: Frozen to the Bone
constellations.description: Qiqi's Normal and Charge Attack DMG against opponents affected by Cryo is increased by 15%.

constellations.title: Ascendant Praise
constellations.description:
Increases the Level of Adeptus Art: Preserver of Fortune by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.title: Divine Suppression
constellations.description: Targets marked by the Fortune-Preserving Talisman have their ATK decreased by 20%.

constellations.title: Crimson Lotus Bloom
constellations.description:
Increases the Level of Adeptus Art: Herald of Frost by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.title: Rite of Resurrection
constellations.description:
Using Adeptus Art: Preserver of Fortune revives all fallen party members nearby and regenerates 50% of their HP.
This effect can only occur once every 15 mins.

characters.name: Raiden Shogun
characters.title: Plane of Euthymia
characters.description: Her Excellency, the Almighty Narukami Ogosho, who promised the people of Inazuma an unchanging Eternity.

abilities.name: Normal Attack
abilities.description: Performs up to 5 consecutive spear strikes.

abilities.name: Charged Attack
abilities.description: Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to perform an upward slash.

abilities.name: Plunging Attack
abilities.description: Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

skills.title: Transcendence: Baleful Omen
skills.description: The Raiden Shogun unveils a shard of her Euthymia, dealing Electro DMG to nearby opponents, and granting nearby party members the Eye of Stormy Judgment.

abilities.name: Eye of Stormy Judgment
descriptions: When characters with this buff attack and deal DMG to opponents, the Eye will unleash a coordinated attack, dealing AoE Electro DMG at the opponent's position.
Characters who gain the Eye of Stormy Judgment will have their Elemental Burst DMG increased based on the Energy Cost of the Elemental Burst during the Eye's duration.
The Eye can initiate one coordinated attack every 0.9s per party.
Coordinated attacks generated by characters not controlled by you deal 20% of the normal DMG.

stats: Elemental Burst DMG Bonus|{param4}% Per Energy

skills.title: Secret Art: Musou Shinsetsu
skills.description: Gathering truths unnumbered and wishes uncounted, the Raiden Shogun unleashes the Musou no Hitotachi and deals AoE Electro DMG, using Musou Isshin in combat for a certain duration afterward. The DMG dealt by Musou no Hitotachi and Musou Isshin's attacks will be increased based on the number of Chakra Desiderata's Resolve stacks consumed when this skill is used.

abilities.name: Musou Isshin
abilities.description:
While in this state, the Raiden Shogun will wield her tachi in battle, while her Normal, Charged, and Plunging Attacks will be infused with Electro DMG, which cannot be overridden. When such attacks hit opponents, she will regenerate Energy for all nearby party members. Energy can be restored this way once every 1s, and this effect can be triggered 5 times throughout this skill's duration.
While in this state, the Raiden Shogun's resistance to interruption is increased, and she is immune to Electro-Charged reaction DMG.
While Musou Isshin is active, the Raiden Shogun's Normal, Charged, and Plunging Attack DMG will be considered Elemental Burst DMG.
The effects of Musou Isshin will be cleared when the Raiden Shogun leaves the field.

abilities.name: Chakra Desiderata
abilities.description:
When nearby party members (excluding the Raiden Shogun herself) use their Elemental Bursts, the Raiden Shogun will build up Resolve stacks based on the Energy Cost of these Elemental Bursts.
The maximum number of Resolve stacks is 60.
The Resolve gained by Chakra Desiderata will be cleared 300s after the Raiden Shogun leaves the field.

stats: Resolve Bonus|{param2}% Initial / {param3}% ATK DMG Per Stack
Resolve Stacks Gained|{param4} Per Energy Consumed

passives.title: All-Preserver
passives.description: Mora expended when ascending Swords and Polearms is decreased by 50%.

passives.title: Enlightened One
passives.description: Each 1% above 100% Energy Recharge that the Raiden Shogun possesses grants her:
descriptions: 0.6% greater Energy restoration from Musou Isshin
0.4% Electro DMG Bonus.

passives.title: Wishes Unnumbered
passives.description:
When nearby party members gain Elemental Orbs or Particles, Chakra Desiderata gains 2 Resolve stacks.
This effect can occur once every 3s.

constellations.title: Ominous Inscription
constellations.description: Chakra Desiderata will gather Resolve even faster. When Electro characters use their Elemental Bursts, the Resolve gained is increased by 80%. When characters of other Elemental Types use their Elemental Bursts, the Resolve gained is increased by 20%.

constellations.title: Steelbreaker
constellations.description: Secret Art: Musou Shinsetsu's Musou no Hitotachi and Musou Isshin attacks will ignore 60% of opponents' DEF.

constellations.title: Shinkage Bygones
constellations.description:
Increases the Level of Secret Art: Musou Shinsetsu by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.title: Pledge of Propriety
constellations.description: When the Musou Isshin state applied by Secret Art: Musou Shinsetsu expires, all nearby party members (excluding the Raiden Shogun) gain 30% bonus ATK for 10s.

constellations.title: Shogun's Descent
constellations.description:
Increases the Level of Transcendence: Baleful Omen by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.title: Wishbearer
constellations.description:
While in the Musou Isshin state applied by Secret Art: Musou Shinsetsu, the Raiden Shogun's Normal, Charged, and Plunging Attacks will decrease all nearby party members' (but not including the Raiden Shogun herself) Elemental Burst CD by 1s when they hit opponents.
This effect can trigger once every 1s, and can trigger a total of 5 times during the state's duration.

characters.name: Razor
characters.title: Wolf Boy
characters.description: A boy who lives among the wolves in Wolvendom of Mondstadt, away from human civilization. As agile as lightning.

abilities.name: Normal Attack
abilities.description: Perform up to 4 consecutive strikes.

abilities.name: Charged Attack
abilities.description:
Drains Stamina over time to perform continuous spinning attacks against all nearby opponents.
At the end of the sequence, perform a more powerful slash.

abilities.name: Plunging Attack
abilities.description: Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

skills.title: Claw and Thunder
skills.description: Hunts his prey using the techniques taught to him by his master and his lupical.

abilities.name: Press
abilities.description:
Swings the Thunder Wolf Claw, dealing Electro DMG to opponents in front of Razor.
Upon striking an opponent, Razor will gain an Electro Sigil, which increases his Energy Recharge rate.
Razor can have up to 3 Electro Sigils simultaneously, and gaining a new Electro Sigil refreshes their duration.

abilities.name: Hold
abilities.description:
Gathers Electro energy to unleash a lightning storm over a small AoE, causing massive Electro DMG, and clears all of Razor's Electro Sigils.
Each Electro Sigil cleared in this manner will be converted into Energy for Razor.

stats: Energy Recharge Bonus|{param3}% per Electro Sigil
Energy Regenerated|{param4} per Electro Sigil Absorbed

skills.title: Lightning Fang
skills.description:
Summons the Wolf Within, which deals Electro DMG to all nearby opponents. This clears all of Razor's Electro Sigils, which will be converted into Elemental Energy for him.
The Wolf Within will fight alongside Razor for the skill's duration.

abilities.name: The Wolf Within
descriptions: Strikes alongside Razor's normal attacks, dealing Electro DMG.
Raises Razor's ATK SPD and Electro RES.
Causes Razor to be immune to DMG inflicted by the Electro-Charged status.
Disables Razor's Charged Attacks.
Increases Razor's resistance to interruption.
These effects end when Razor leaves the battlefield.
When Razor leaves the field, a maximum of 10 Energy will be returned to him based off the duration remaining on this skill.

stats: Soul Companion DMG|{param2}% Normal Attack DMG

passives.title: Wolvensprint
passives.description:
Decreases sprinting Stamina consumption for your own party members by 20%.
Not stackable with Passive Talents that provide the exact same effects.

passives.title: Awakening
passives.description:
Decreases Claw and Thunder's CD by 18%.
Using Lightning Fang resets the CD of Claw and Thunder.

passives.title: Hunger
passives.description: When Razor's Energy is below 50%, increases Energy Recharge by 30%.

constellations.title: Wolf's Instinct
constellations.description: Picking up an Elemental Orb or Particle increases Razor's DMG by 10% for 8s.

constellations.title: Suppression
constellations.description: Increases CRIT Rate against opponents with less than 30% HP by 10%.

constellations.title: Soul Companion
constellations.description:
Increases the Level of Lightning Fang by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.title: Bite
constellations.description: When casting Claw and Thunder (Press), opponents hit will have their DEF decreased by 15% for 7s.

constellations.title: Sharpened Claws
constellations.description:
Increases the Level of Claw and Thunder by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.title: Lupus Fulguris
constellations.description:
Every 10s, Razor's sword charges up, causing the next Normal Attack to release lightning that deals 100% of Razor's ATK as Electro DMG.
When Razor is not using Lightning Fang, a lightning strike on an opponent will grant Razor an Electro Sigil for Claw and Thunder.

characters.name: Rosaria
characters.title: Thorny Benevolence
characters.description: A sister of the church, though you wouldn't know it if it weren't for her attire. Known for her sharp, cold words and manner, she often works alone.

abilities.name: Normal Attack
abilities.description: Performs up to five consecutive spear strikes.

abilities.name: Charged Attack
abilities.description: Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to lunge forward, dealing damage to opponents along the way.

abilities.name: Plunging Attack
abilities.description: Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

skills.title: Ravaging Confession
skills.description:
Rosaria swiftly shifts her position to appear behind her opponent, then stabs and slashes them with her polearm, dealing Cryo DMG.
This ability cannot be used to travel behind opponents of a larger build.

skills.title: Rites of Termination
skills.description:
Rosaria's unique take on this prayer ritual: First, she swings her weapon to slash surrounding opponents; then, she summons a frigid Ice Lance that strikes the ground. Both actions deal Cryo DMG.
While active, the Ice Lance periodically releases a blast of cold air, dealing Cryo DMG to surrounding opponents.

passives.title: Night Walk
passives.description:
At night (18:00–6:00), increases the Movement SPD of your own party members by 10%.
Does not take effect in Domains, Trounce Domains, or Spiral Abyss. Not stackable with Passive Talents that provide the exact same effects.

passives.title: Regina Probationum
passives.description: When Rosaria strikes an opponent from behind using Ravaging Confession, Rosaria's CRIT Rate increases by 12% for 5s.

passives.title: Shadow Samaritan
passives.description:
Casting Rites of Termination increases CRIT Rate of all nearby party members (except Rosaria herself) by 15% of Rosaria's CRIT Rate for 10s.
CRIT Rate Bonus gained this way cannot exceed 15%.

constellations.title: Unholy Revelation
constellations.description: When Rosaria deals a CRIT Hit, her ATK SPD increases by 10% and her Normal Attack DMG increases by 10% for 4s.

constellations.title: Land Without Promise
constellations.description: The duration of the Ice Lance created by Rites of Termination is increased by 4s.

constellations.title: The Wages of Sin
constellations.description:
Increases the Level of Ravaging Confession by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.title: Painful Grace
constellations.description:
Ravaging Confession's CRIT Hits regenerate 5 Energy for Rosaria.
Can only be triggered once each time Ravaging Confession is cast.

constellations.title: Last Rites
constellations.description:
Increases the Level of Rites of Termination by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.title: Divine Retribution
constellations.description: Rites of Termination's attack decreases opponents' Physical RES by 20% for 10s.

characters.name: Sangonomiya Kokomi
characters.title: Pearl of Wisdom
characters.description: The Divine Priestess of Watatsumi Island. All of the island's affairs are at this young lady's fingertips.

abilities.name: Normal Attack
abilities.description: Performs up to 3 consecutive attacks that take the form of swimming fish, dealing Hydro DMG.

abilities.name: Charged Attack
abilities.description: Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to deal AoE Hydro DMG after a short casting time.

abilities.name: Plunging Attack
abilities.description: Gathering the might of Hydro, Kokomi plunges towards the ground from mid-air, damaging all opponents in her path. Deals AoE Hydro DMG upon impact with the ground.

skills.title: Kurage's Oath
skills.description:
Summons a "bake-kurage" created from water that can heal her allies.
Using this skill will apply the Wet status to Sangonomiya Kokomi.

abilities.name: Bake-Kurage
abilities.description: Deals Hydro DMG to surrounding opponents and heal nearby active characters at fixed intervals. This healing is based on Kokomi's Max HP.

skills.title: Nereid's Ascension
skills.description: The might of Watatsumi descends, dealing Hydro DMG to surrounding opponents, before robing Kokomi in a Ceremonial Garment made from the flowing waters of Sangonomiya.

abilities.name: Ceremonial Garment
descriptions: Sangonomiya Kokomi's Normal Attack, Charged Attack and Bake-Kurage DMG are increased based on her Max HP.
When her Normal and Charged Attacks hit opponents, Kokomi will restore HP for all nearby party members, and the amount restored is based on her Max HP.
Increases Sangonomiya Kokomi's resistance to interruption and allows her to move on the water's surface.
These effects will be cleared once Sangonomiya Kokomi leaves the field.

stats: Normal Attack DMG Bonus|{param2}% Max HP
Charged Attack DMG Bonus|{param3}% Max HP
HP Regeneration Per Hit|{param5}% Max HP + {param6}

passives.title: Tamanooya's Casket
passives.description: If Sangonomiya Kokomi's own Bake-Kurage are on the field when she uses Nereid's Ascension, the Bake-Kurage's duration will be refreshed.

passives.title: Song of Pearls
passives.description: While donning the Ceremonial Garment created by Nereid's Ascension, the Normal and Charged Attack DMG Bonus Sangonomiya Kokomi gains based on her Max HP will receive a further increase based on 15% of her Healing Bonus.

passives.title: Princess of Watatsumi
passives.description:
Decreases swimming Stamina consumption for your own party members by 20%.
Not stackable with Passive Talents that provide the exact same effects.

passives.title: Flawless Strategy
passives.description: Sangonomiya Kokomi has a 25% Healing Bonus, but a 100% decrease in CRIT Rate.

constellations.title: At Water's Edge
constellations.description:
While donning the Ceremonial Garment created by Nereid's Ascension, the final Normal Attack in Sangonomiya Kokomi's combo will unleash a swimming fish to deal 30% of her Max HP as Hydro DMG.
This DMG is not considered Normal Attack DMG.

constellations.title: The Clouds Like Waves Rippling
constellations.description: Sangonomiya Kokomi gains the following Healing Bonuses with regard to characters with 50% or less HP via the following methods:
descriptions: Kurage's Oath Bake-Kurage: 4.5% of Kokomi's Max HP.
Nereid's Ascension Normal and Charged Attacks: 0.6% of Kokomi's Max HP.

constellations.title: The Moon, A Ship O'er the Seas
constellations.description:
Increases the Level of Nereid's Ascension by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.title: The Moon Overlooks the Waters
constellations.description:
While donning the Ceremonial Garment created by Nereid's Ascension, Sangonomiya Kokomi's Normal Attack SPD is increased by 10%, and Normal Attacks that hit opponents will restore 0.8 Energy for her.
This effect can occur once every 0.2s.

constellations.title: All Streams Flow to the Sea
constellations.description:
Increases the Level of Kurage's Oath by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.title: Sango Isshin
constellations.description: While donning the Ceremonial Garment created by Nereid's Ascension, Sangonomiya Kokomi gains a 40% Hydro DMG Bonus for 4s after her Normal and Charged Attacks heal a character with 80% or more HP.

characters.name: Sayu
characters.title: Mujina Ninja
characters.description: A pint-sized ninja attached to the Shuumatsuban, who always seems sleep-deprived.

abilities.name: Normal Attack
abilities.description: Performs up to 4 consecutive strikes.

abilities.name: Charged Attack
abilities.description:
Drains Stamina over time to perform continuous spinning attacks against all nearby opponents.
At the end of the sequence, perform a more powerful slash.

abilities.name: Plunging Attack
abilities.description: Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

skills.title: Yoohoo Art: Fuuin Dash
skills.description:
The special technique of the Yoohoo Ninja Arts!
Sayu curls up into a rolling Fuufuu Windwheel and smashes into opponents at high speed, dealing Anemo DMG. When the duration ends, she unleashes a Fuufuu Whirlwind Kick, dealing AoE Anemo DMG.

abilities.name: Press
abilities.description: Enters the Fuufuu Windwheel state, rolling forward a short distance before using the Fuufuu Whirlwind Kick.

abilities.name: Hold
abilities.description:
Rolls about continuously in the Fuufuu Windwheel state, increasing Sayu's resistance to interruption while within that state.
During this time, Sayu can control the direction of her roll, and can use the skill again to end her Windwheel state early and unleash a stronger version of the Fuufuu Whirlwind Kick.
The Hold version of this skill can trigger Elemental Absorption.
This skill has a maximum duration of 10s and enters CD once its effects end. The longer Sayu remains in her Windwheel state, the longer the CD.

abilities.name: Elemental Absorption
abilities.description:
If Sayu comes into contact with Hydro/Pyro/Cryo/Electro while in her Windwheel state, she will deal additional elemental DMG of that type.
Elemental Absorption may only occur once per use of this skill.

skills.title: Yoohoo Art: Mujina Flurry
skills.description:
The other super special technique of the Yoohoo Ninja Arts! It summons a pair of helping hands for Sayu.
Deals Anemo DMG to nearby opponents and heals all nearby party members. The amount of HP restored is based on Sayu's ATK. This skill then summons a Muji-Muji Daruma.

abilities.name: Muji-Muji Daruma
abilities.description: At specific intervals, the Daruma will take one of several actions based on the situation around it:
descriptions: If the HP of nearby characters is above 70%, it will attack a nearby opponent, dealing Anemo DMG.

If there are active characters with 70% or less HP nearby, it will heal the active character with the lowest percentage HP left. If there are no opponents nearby, it will heal active characters nearby even if they have 70% HP or more.

passives.title: Yoohoo Art: Silencer's Secret
passives.description:
When Sayu is in the party, your characters will not startle Crystalflies and certain other animals when getting near them.
Check the "Other" sub-category of the "Living Beings / Wildlife" section in the Archive for creatures this skill works on.

passives.title: Someone More Capable
passives.description:
When Sayu triggers a Swirl reaction while active, she heals all your characters and nearby allies for 300 HP. She will also heal an additional 1.2 HP for every point of Elemental Mastery she has.
This effect can be triggered once every 2s.

passives.title: No Work Today!
passives.description: The Muji-Muji Daruma created by Yoohoo Art: Mujina Flurry gains the following effects:
descriptions: When healing a character, it will also heal characters near that healed character for 20% the amount of HP.
Increases the AoE of its attack against opponents.

constellations.title: Multi-Task no Jutsu
constellations.description: The Muji-Muji Daruma created by Yoohoo Art: Mujina Flurry will ignore HP limits and can simultaneously attack nearby opponents and heal characters.

constellations.title: Egress Prep
constellations.description: Yoohoo Art: Fuuin Dash gains the following effects:
descriptions: DMG of Fuufuu Whirlwind Kick in Press Mode increased by 3.3%.
Every 0.5s in the Fuufuu Windwheel state will increase the DMG of this Fuufuu Whirlwind Kick by 3.3%. The maximum DMG increase possible through this method is 66%.

constellations.title: Eh, the Bunshin Can Handle It
constellations.description:
Increases the Level of Yoohoo Art: Mujina Flurry by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.title: Skiving: New and Improved
constellations.description:
Sayu recovers 1.2 Energy when she triggers a Swirl reaction.
This effect occurs once every 2s.

constellations.title: Speed Comes First
constellations.description:
Increases the Level of Yoohoo Art: Fuuin Dash by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.title: Sleep O'Clock
constellations.description: The Muji-Muji Daruma created by Sayu's Yoohoo Art: Mujina Flurry will now also benefit from her Elemental Mastery. Each point of Sayu's Elemental Mastery will produce the following effects:
descriptions: Increases the damage dealt by the Muji-Muji Daruma's attacks by 0.2% ATK. A maximum of 400% ATK can be gained via this method.
Increases the HP restored by the Muji-Muji Daruma by 3. A maximum of 6,000 additional HP can be restored in this manner.

characters.name: Shenhe
characters.title: Lonesome Transcendence
characters.description: An adepti disciple with a most unusual air about her. Having spent much time cultivating in isolation in Liyue's mountains, she has become every bit as cool and distant as the adepti themselves.

abilities.name: Normal Attack
abilities.description: Performs up to five consecutive spear strikes.

abilities.name: Charged Attack
abilities.description: Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to lunge forward, dealing damage to opponents along the way.

abilities.name: Plunging Attack
abilities.description: Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

skills.title: Spring Spirit Summoning
skills.description:
The frosted dew, silvery and dense, shall exorcise all demons.
Grants all nearby party members the Icy Quill effect and deals Cryo DMG in different ways based on whether it is pressed or held.

abilities.name: Press
abilities.description: Rushes forward together with a Talisman Spirit, dealing Cryo DMG to opponents along the path.

abilities.name: Hold
abilities.description: Commands the Talisman Spirit to deal AoE Cryo DMG.

abilities.name: Icy Quill
abilities.description:
When Normal, Charged, and Plunging Attacks, Elemental Skills, and Elemental Bursts deal Cryo DMG to opponents, the DMG dealt is increased based on Shenhe's current ATK.
The Icy Quill's effects will be cleared once its duration ends or after being triggered a certain number of times. When held rather than pressed, the Icy Quill's effect lasts longer and can be triggered more times.
When one Cryo DMG instance strikes multiple opponents, the effect is triggered multiple times based on the number of opponents hit. The number of times the effect is triggered is calculated independently for each party member with the Icy Quill.

skills.title: Divine Maiden's Deliverance
skills.description:
Unleashes the power of the Talisman Spirit, allowing it to roam free in this plane, dealing AoE Cryo DMG.
The Talisman Spirit then creates a field that decreases the Cryo RES and Physical RES of opponents within it. It also deals periodic Cryo DMG to opponents within the field.

passives.title: Precise Comings and Goings
passives.description: Gains 25% more rewards when dispatched on a Liyue Expedition for 20 hours.

passives.title: Deific Embrace
passives.description: An active character within the field created by Divine Maiden's Deliverance gains 15% Cryo DMG Bonus.

passives.title: Spirit Communion Seal
passives.description: After Shenhe uses Spring Spirit Summoning, she will grant all nearby party members the following effects:
descriptions: Press: Elemental Skill and Elemental Burst DMG increased by 15% for 10s.
Hold: Normal, Charged, and Plunging Attack DMG increased by 15% for 15s.

constellations.title: Clarity of Heart
constellations.description: Spring Spirit Summoning can be used 1 more time.

constellations.title: Centered Spirit
constellations.description: Divine Maiden's Deliverance lasts for 6 seconds longer. Active characters within the skill's field deals 15% increased Cryo CRIT DMG.

constellations.title: Seclusion
constellations.description:
Increases the Level of Spring Spirit Summoning by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.title: Insight
constellations.description: When characters under the effect of Icy Quill applied by Shenhe trigger its DMG Bonus effects, Shenhe will gain a Skyfrost Mantra stack:
descriptions: When Shenhe uses Spring Spirit Summoning, she will consume all stacks of Skyfrost Mantra, increasing the DMG of that Spring Spirit Summoning by 5% for each stack consumed.
Max 50 stacks. Stacks last for 60s.

constellations.title: Divine Attainment
constellations.description:
Increases the Level of Divine Maiden's Deliverance by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.title: Mystical Abandon
constellations.description: When characters trigger Icy Quill's effects using Normal and Charged Attack DMG, it does not count toward the Trigger Quota.

characters.name: Sucrose
characters.title: Harmless Sweetie
characters.description: An alchemist filled with curiosity about all things. She researches bio-alchemy.

abilities.name: Normal Attack
abilities.description: Performs up to 4 attacks using Wind Spirits, dealing Anemo DMG.

abilities.name: Charged Attack
abilities.description: Consumes a certain amount of Stamina and deals AoE Anemo DMG after a short casting time.

abilities.name: Plunging Attack
abilities.description: Calling upon the power of her Wind Spirits, Sucrose plunges towards the ground from mid-air, damaging all opponents in her path. Deals AoE Anemo DMG upon impact with the ground.

skills.title: Astable Anemohypostasis Creation - 6308
skills.description: Creates a small Wind Spirit that pulls opponents and objects towards its location, launches opponents within its AoE, and deals Anemo DMG.

skills.title: Forbidden Creation - Isomer 75 / Type II
skills.description:
Sucrose hurls an unstable concoction that creates a Large Wind Spirit.
While it persists, the Large Wind Spirit will continuously pull in surrounding opponents and objects, launch nearby opponents, and deal Anemo DMG.

abilities.name: Elemental Absorption
abilities.description:
If the Wind Spirit comes into contact with Hydro/Pyro/Cryo/Electro energy, it will deal additional elemental DMG of that type.
Elemental Absorption may only occur once per use.

passives.title: Astable Invention
passives.description: When Sucrose crafts Character and Weapon Enhancement Materials, she has a 10% to obtain double the product.

passives.title: Catalyst Conversion
passives.description: When Sucrose triggers a Swirl reaction, all characters in the party with the matching element (excluding Sucrose) have their Elemental Mastery increased by 50 for 8s.

passives.title: Mollis Favonius
passives.description: When Astable Anemohypostasis Creation - 6308 or Forbidden Creation - Isomer 75 / Type II hits an opponent, increases all party members' (excluding Sucrose) Elemental Mastery by an amount equal to 20% of Sucrose's Elemental Mastery for 8s.

constellations.title: Clustered Vacuum Field
constellations.description: Astable Anemohypostasis Creation - 6308 gains 1 additional charge.

constellations.title: Beth: Unbound Form
constellations.description: The duration of Forbidden Creation - Isomer 75 / Type II is increased by 2s.

constellations.title: Flawless Alchemistress
constellations.description:
Increases the Level of Astable Anemohypostasis Creation - 6308 by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.title: Alchemania
constellations.description: Every 7 Normal and Charged Attacks, Sucrose will reduce the CD of Astable Anemohypostasis Creation - 6308 by 1-7s.

constellations.title: Caution: Standard Flask
constellations.description:
Increases the Level of Forbidden Creation - Isomer 75 / Type II by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.title: Chaotic Entropy
constellations.description: If Forbidden Creation - Isomer 75 / Type II triggers an Elemental Absorption, all party members gain a 20% Elemental DMG Bonus for the corresponding absorbed element during its duration.

characters.name: Tartaglia
characters.title: Childe
characters.description: No. 11 of The Harbingers, also known as "Childe." His name is highly feared on the battlefield.

abilities.name: Normal Attack
abilities.description: Perform up to 6 consecutive shots with a bow.

abilities.name: Charged Attack
abilities.description:
Perform a more precise Aimed Shot with increased DMG.
While aiming, the power of Hydro will accumulate on the arrowhead. A arrow fully charged with the torrent will deal Hydro DMG and apply the Riptide status.

abilities.name: Riptide
abilities.description: Opponents affected by Riptide will suffer from AoE Hydro DMG effects when attacked by Tartaglia in various ways. DMG dealt in this way is considered Normal Attack DMG.
descriptions: Riptide Flash: A fully-charged Aimed Shot that hits an opponent affected by Riptide deals consecutive bouts of AoE DMG. Can occur once every 0.7s.
Riptide Burst: Defeating an opponent affected by Riptide creates a Hydro burst that inflicts the Riptide status on nearby opponents hit.

abilities.name: Plunging Attack
abilities.description: Fires off a shower of arrows in mid-air before falling and striking the ground, dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

skills.title: Foul Legacy: Raging Tide
skills.description: Unleashes a set of weaponry made of pure water, dealing Hydro DMG to surrounding opponents and entering Melee Stance.

abilities.description: In this Stance, Tartaglia's Normal and Charged Attacks are converted to Hydro DMG that cannot be overridden by any other elemental infusion and change as follows:

abilities.name: Normal Attack
abilities.description: Perform up to 6 consecutive Hydro strikes.

abilities.name: Charged Attack
abilities.description: Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to unleash a cross slash, dealing Hydro DMG.

abilities.name: Riptide Slash
abilities.description:
Hitting an opponent affected by Riptide with a melee attack unleashes a Riptide Slash that deals AoE Hydro DMG. DMG dealt in this way is considered Elemental Skill DMG, and can only occur once every 1.5s.
After 30s, or when the ability is unleashed again, this skill will end. Tartaglia will return to his Ranged Stance and this ability will enter CD. The longer Tartaglia stays in his Melee Stance, the longer the CD.
If the return to a ranged stance occurs automatically after 30s, the CD is even longer.

skills.title: Havoc: Obliteration
skills.description: Performs different attacks based on what stance Tartaglia is in when casting.

abilities.name: Ranged Stance: Flash of Havoc
abilities.description:
Swiftly fires a Hydro-imbued magic arrow, dealing AoE Hydro DMG and applying the Riptide status.
Returns a portion of its Energy Cost after use.

abilities.name: Melee Stance: Light of Obliteration
abilities.description: Performs a slash with a large AoE, dealing massive Hydro DMG to all surrounding opponents, which triggers Riptide Blast.

abilities.name: Riptide Blast
abilities.description:
When the obliterating waters hit an opponent affected by Riptide, it clears their Riptide status and triggers a Hydro Explosion that deals AoE Hydro DMG.
DMG dealt in this way is considered Elemental Burst DMG.

passives.title: Master of Weaponry
passives.description: Increases your own party members' Normal Attack Level by 1.

passives.title: Never Ending
passives.description: Extends Riptide duration by 8s.

passives.title: Sword of Torrents
passives.description: When Tartaglia is in Foul Legacy: Raging Tide's Melee Stance, on dealing a CRIT hit, Normal and Charged Attacks apply the Riptide status effect to opponents.

constellations.title: Foul Legacy: Tide Withholder
constellations.description: Decreases the CD of Foul Legacy: Raging Tide by 20%

constellations.title: Foul Legacy: Understream
constellations.description: When opponents affected by Riptide are defeated, Tartaglia regenerates 4 Elemental Energy.

constellations.title: Abyssal Mayhem: Vortex of Turmoil
constellations.description:
Increases the Level of Foul Legacy: Raging Tide by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.title: Abyssal Mayhem: Hydrospout
constellations.description:
If Tartaglia is in Foul Legacy: Raging Tide's Melee Stance, triggers Riptide Slash against opponents on the field affected by Riptide every 4s, otherwise, triggers Riptide Flash.
Riptide Slashes and Riptide Flashes triggered by this Constellation effect are not subject to the time intervals that would typically apply to these two Riptide effects, nor do they have any effect on those time intervals.

constellations.title: Havoc: Formless Blade
constellations.description:
Increases the Level of Havoc: Obliteration by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.title: Havoc: Annihilation
constellations.description:
When Havoc: Obliteration is cast in Melee Stance, the CD of Foul Legacy: Raging Tide is reset.
This effect will only take place once Tartaglia returns to his Ranged Stance.

characters.name: Thoma
characters.title: Protector From Afar
characters.description: The Kamisato Clan's housekeeper. A well-known "fixer" in Inazuma.

abilities.name: Normal Attack
abilities.description: Performs up to four consecutive spear strikes.

abilities.name: Charged Attack
abilities.description: Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to lunge forward, dealing damage to opponents along the way.

abilities.name: Plunging Attack
abilities.description: Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

skills.title: Blazing Blessing
skills.description:
Thoma vaults forward with his polearm and delivers a flame-filled flying kick that deals AoE Pyro DMG, while also summoning a defensive Blazing Barrier. At the moment of casting, Thoma's Elemental Skill applies Pyro to himself.
The DMG Absorption of the Blazing Barrier scales off Thoma's Max HP.

abilities.description: The Blazing Barrier has the following traits:
descriptions: Absorbs Pyro DMG 250% more effectively.
When a new Blazing Barrier is obtained, the remaining DMG Absorption of an existing Blazing Barrier will stack and its duration will be refreshed.
The maximum DMG Absorption of the Blazing Barrier will not exceed a certain percentage of Thoma's Max HP.

stats: Max Shield DMG Absorption|{param5}% Max HP+ {param6}

skills.title: Crimson Ooyoroi
skills.description: Thoma spins his polearm, slicing at his foes with roaring flames that deal AoE Pyro DMG and weave themselves into a Scorching Ooyoroi.

abilities.name: Scorching Ooyoroi
abilities.description:
While Scorching Ooyoroi is in effect, the active character's Normal Attacks will trigger Fiery Collapse, dealing AoE Pyro DMG and summoning a Blazing Barrier.
Fiery Collapse can be triggered once every 1s.
Except for the amount of DMG they can absorb, the Blazing Barriers created in this way are identical to those created by Thoma's Elemental Skill, Blazing Blessing:
descriptions: Absorbs Pyro DMG 250% more effectively.
When a new Blazing Barrier is obtained, the remaining DMG Absorption of an existing Blazing Barrier will stack and its duration will be refreshed.
The maximum DMG Absorption of the Blazing Barrier will not exceed a certain percentage of Thoma's Max HP.
If Thoma falls, the effects of Scorching Ooyoroi will be cleared.

passives.title: Snap and Swing
passives.description: When you fish successfully in Inazuma, Thoma's help grants a 20% chance of scoring a double catch.

passives.title: Imbricated Armor
passives.description:
When your current active character obtains or refreshes a Blazing Barrier, this character's Shield Strength will increase by 5% for 6s.
This effect can be triggered once every 0.3s seconds. Max 5 stacks.

passives.title: Flaming Assault
passives.description: DMG dealt by Crimson Ooyoroi's Fiery Collapse is increased by 2.2% of Thoma's Max HP.

constellations.title: A Comrade's Duty
constellations.description:
When a character protected by Thoma's own Blazing Barrier (Thoma excluded) is attacked, Thoma's own Blazing Blessing CD is decreased by 3s, while his own Crimson Ooyoroi's CD is decreased by 3s.
This effect can be triggered once every 20s.

constellations.title: A Subordinate's Skills
constellations.description: Crimson Ooyoroi's duration is increased by 3s.

constellations.title: Fortified Resolve
constellations.description:
Increases the Level of Blazing Blessing by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.title: Long-Term Planning
constellations.description: After using Crimson Ooyoroi, 15 Energy will be restored to Thoma.

constellations.title: Raging Wildfire
constellations.description:
Increases the Level of Crimson Ooyoroi by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.title: Burning Heart
constellations.description: When a Blazing Barrier is obtained or refreshed, the DMG dealt by all party members' Normal, Charged, and Plunging Attacks is increased by 15% for 6s.

characters.name: Traveler (Anemo)
characters.description: A traveler from another world who had their only kin taken away, forcing them to embark on a journey to find The Seven.

abilities.name: Normal Attack
abilities.description: Perform up to 5 rapid strikes.

abilities.name: Charged Attack
abilities.description: Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to unleash 2 rapid sword strikes.

abilities.name: Plunging Attack
abilities.description: Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

skills.title: Palm Vortex
skills.description:
Grasping the wind's might, you form a vortex of vacuum in your palm, causing continuous Anemo DMG to opponents in front of you.
The vacuum vortex explodes when the skill duration ends, causing a greater amount of Anemo DMG over a larger area.

abilities.name: Hold
abilities.description: DMG and AoE will gradually increase.

abilities.name: Elemental Absorption
abilities.description:
If the vortex comes into contact with Hydro/Pyro/Cryo/Electro, it will deal additional elemental DMG of that type.
Elemental Absorption may only occur once per use.

skills.title: Gust Surge
skills.description: Guiding the path of the wind currents, you summon a forward-moving tornado that pulls objects and opponents towards itself, dealing continuous Anemo DMG.

abilities.name: Elemental Absorption
abilities.description:
If the tornado comes into contact with Hydro/Pyro/Cryo/Electro, it will deal additional elemental DMG of that type.
Elemental Absorption may only occur once per use.

passives.title: Slitting Wind
passives.description: The last hit of a Normal Attack combo unleashes a wind blade, dealing 60% of ATK as Anemo DMG to all opponents in its path.

passives.title: Second Wind
passives.description: Palm Vortex kills regenerate 2% HP for 5s. This effect can only occur once every 5s.

constellations.title: Raging Vortex
constellations.description: Palm Vortex pulls in opponents and objects within a 5m radius.

constellations.title: Uprising Whirlwind
constellations.description: Increases Energy Recharge by 16%.

constellations.title: Sweeping Gust
constellations.description:
Increases the Level of Gust Surge by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.title: Cherishing Breezes
constellations.description: Reduces DMG taken while casting Palm Vortex by 10%.

constellations.title: Vortex Stellaris
constellations.description:
Increases the Level of Palm Vortex by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.title: Intertwined Winds
constellations.description:
Targets who take DMG from Gust Surge have their Anemo RES decreased by 20%.
If an Elemental Absorption occurred, then their RES towards the corresponding Element is also decreased by 20%.

characters.name: Traveler (Electro)
characters.description: A traveler from another world who had their only kin taken away, forcing them to embark on a journey to find The Seven.

abilities.name: Normal Attack
abilities.description: Performs up to 5 rapid strikes.

abilities.name: Charged Attack
abilities.description: Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to unleash 2 rapid sword strikes.

abilities.name: Plunging Attack
abilities.description: Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

skills.title: Lightning Blade
skills.description:
Unleashes three swift thunder shadows that deal Electro DMG to opponents and leave an Abundance Amulet behind after hitting an opponent.
2 Abundance Amulets can be created initially. Using this skill will reset any Abundance Amulets that were generated.

abilities.name: Abundance Amulets
abilities.description: When a character is near an Abundance Amulet, they will absorb it and obtain the following effects:
descriptions: Restores Elemental Energy
Increases Energy Recharge during the Abundance Amulet's duration.

skills.title: Bellowing Thunder
skills.description: You call upon the protection of lightning, knocking nearby opponents back and dealing Electro DMG to them.

abilities.name: Lightning Shroud
abilities.description:
When your active character's Normal or Charged Attacks hit opponents, they will call Falling Thunder forth, dealing Electro DMG.
When Falling Thunder hits opponents, it will regenerate Energy for that character.
One instance of Falling Thunder can be generated every 0.5s.

passives.title: Thunderflash
passives.description: When another nearby character in the party obtains an Abundance Amulet created by Lightning Blade, Lightning Blade's CD is decreased by 1.5s.

passives.title: Resounding Roar
passives.description: Increases the Energy Recharge effect granted by Lightning Blade's Abundance Amulet by 10% of the Traveler's Energy Recharge.

constellations.title: Spring Thunder of Fertility
constellations.description: The number of Abundance Amulets that can be generated using Lightning Blade is increased to 3.

constellations.title: Violet Vehemence
constellations.description: When Falling Thunder created by Bellowing Thunder hits an opponent, it will decrease their Electro RES by 15% for 8s.

constellations.title: Distant Crackling
constellations.description:
Increases the Level of Bellowing Thunder by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.title: Fickle Cloudstrike
constellations.description: When a character obtains Abundance Amulets generated by Lightning Blade, if this character's Energy is less than 35%, the Energy restored by the Abundance Amulets is increased by 100%.

constellations.title: Clamor in the Wilds
constellations.description:
Increases the Level of Lightning Blade by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.title: World-Shaker
constellations.description: Every 2 Falling Thunder attacks triggered by Bellowing Thunder will greatly increase the DMG dealt by the next Falling Thunder, which will deal 200% of its original DMG and will restore an additional 1 Energy to the current character.

characters.name: Traveler (Geo)
characters.description: A traveler from another world who had their only kin taken away, forcing them to embark on a journey to find The Seven.

abilities.name: Normal Attack
abilities.description: Perform up to 5 rapid strikes.

abilities.name: Charged Attack
abilities.description: Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to unleash 2 rapid sword strikes.

abilities.name: Plunging Attack
abilities.description: Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

skills.title: Starfell Sword
skills.description:
You disgorge a meteorite from the depths of the earth, dealing AoE Geo DMG.
The meteorite is considered a Geo Construct, and can be climbed or used to block attacks.

abilities.name: Hold
abilities.description: This skill's positioning may be adjusted.

skills.title: Wake of Earth
skills.description:
Energizing the Geo deep underground, you set off expanding shockwaves.
Launches surrounding opponents back and deals AoE Geo DMG.
A stone wall is erected at the edges of the shockwave.
The stone wall is considered a Geo Construct, and may be used to block attacks.

passives.title: Shattered Darkrock
passives.description: Reduces Starfell Sword's CD by 2s.

passives.title: Frenzied Rockslide
passives.description: The final hit of a Normal Attack combo triggers a collapse, dealing 60% of ATK as AoE Geo DMG.

constellations.title: Invincible Stonewall
constellations.description: Party members within the radius of Wake of Earth have their CRIT Rate increased by 10% and have increased resistance against interruption.

constellations.title: Rockcore Meltdown
constellations.description: When the meteorite created by Starfell Sword is destroyed, it will also explode, dealing additional AoE Geo DMG equal to the amount of damage dealt by Starfell Sword.

constellations.title: Will of the Rock
constellations.description:
Increases the Level of Wake of Earth by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.title: Reaction Force
constellations.description:
The shockwave triggered by Wake of Earth regenerates 5 Energy for every opponent hit.
A maximum of 25 Energy can be regenerated in this manner at any one time.

constellations.title: Meteorite Impact
constellations.description:
Increases the Level of Starfell Sword by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.title: Everlasting Boulder
constellations.description:
The barrier created by Wake of Earth lasts 5s longer.
The meteorite created by Starfell Sword lasts 10s longer.

characters.name: Venti
characters.title: Windborne Bard
characters.description: One of the many bards of Mondstadt, who freely wanders the city's streets and alleys.

abilities.name: Normal Attack
abilities.description: Perform up to 6 consecutive shots with a bow.

abilities.name: Charged Attack
abilities.description:
Perform a more precise Aimed Shot with increased DMG.
While aiming, favorable winds will accumulate on the arrowhead. A fully charged wind arrow will deal Anemo DMG.

abilities.name: Plunging Attack
abilities.description: Fires off a shower of arrows in mid-air before falling and striking the ground, dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

skills.title: Skyward Sonnet
skills.description: O wind upon which all hymns and songs fly, bear these earth-walkers up into the sky!

abilities.name: Press
abilities.description: Summons a Wind Domain at the opponent's location, dealing AoE Anemo DMG and launching opponents into the air.

abilities.name: Hold
abilities.description:
Summons an even larger Wind Domain with Venti as the epicenter, dealing AoE Anemo DMG and launching affected opponents into the air.
After unleashing the Hold version of this ability, Venti rides the wind into the air.
Opponents hit by Skyward Sonnet will fall to the ground slowly.

skills.title: Wind's Grand Ode
skills.description: Fires off an arrow made of countless coalesced winds, creating a huge Stormeye that sucks in opponents and deals continuous Anemo DMG.

abilities.name: Elemental Absorption
abilities.description:
If the Stormeye comes into contact with Hydro/Pyro/Cryo/Electro, it will deal additional elemental DMG of that type.
Elemental Absorption may only occur once per use.

passives.title: Windrider
passives.description:
Decreases gliding Stamina consumption for your own party members by 20%.
Not stackable with Passive Talents that provide the exact same effects.

passives.title: Embrace of Winds
passives.description: Holding Skyward Sonnet creates an upcurrent that lasts for 20s.

passives.title: Stormeye
passives.description:
Regenerates 15 Energy for Venti after the effects of Wind's Grand Ode end.
If an Elemental Absorption occurred, this also restores 15 Energy to all characters of that corresponding element in the party.

constellations.title: Splitting Gales
constellations.description: Fires 2 additional arrows per Aimed Shot, each dealing 33% of the original arrow's DMG.

constellations.title: Breeze of Reminiscence
constellations.description:
Skyward Sonnet decreases opponents' Anemo RES and Physical RES by 12% for 10s.
Opponents launched by Skyward Sonnet suffer an additional 12% Anemo RES and Physical RES decrease while airborne.

constellations.title: Ode to Thousand Winds
constellations.description:
Increases the Level of Wind's Grand Ode by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.title: Hurricane of Freedom
constellations.description: When Venti picks up an Elemental Orb or Particle, he receives a 25% Anemo DMG Bonus for 10s.

constellations.title: Concerto dal Cielo
constellations.description:
Increases the Level of Skyward Sonnet by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.title: Storm of Defiance
constellations.description:
Targets who take DMG from Wind's Grand Ode have their Anemo RES decreased by 20%.
If an Elemental Absorption occurred, then their RES towards the corresponding Element is also decreased by 20%.

characters.name: Xiangling
characters.title: Exquisite Delicacy
characters.description: A renowned chef from Liyue. She's extremely passionate about cooking and excels at making her signature hot and spicy dishes.

abilities.name: Normal Attack
abilities.description: Performs up to five consecutive spear strikes.

abilities.name: Charged Attack
abilities.description: Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to lunge forward, dealing damage to opponents along the way.

abilities.name: Plunging Attack
abilities.description: Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

skills.title: Guoba Attack
skills.description: Summons Guoba the Panda. Guoba continuously breathes fire at opponents, dealing AoE Pyro DMG.

skills.title: Pyronado
skills.description:
Displaying her mastery over both fire and polearms, Xiangling sends a Pyronado whirling around her.
The Pyronado will move with your character for the ability's duration, dealing Pyro DMG to all opponents in its path.

passives.title: Chef de Cuisine
passives.description: When Xiangling cooks an ATK-boosting dish perfectly, she has a 12% chance to receive double the product.

passives.title: Crossfire
passives.description: Increases the flame range of Guoba by 20%.

passives.title: Beware, It's Super Hot!
passives.description: When Guoba Attack's effect ends, Guoba leaves a chili pepper on the spot where it disappeared. Picking up a chili pepper increases ATK by 10% for 10s.

constellations.title: Crispy Outside, Tender Inside
constellations.description: Opponents hit by Guoba's attacks have their Pyro RES reduced by 15% for 6s.

constellations.title: Oil Meets Fire
constellations.description: The last attack in a Normal Attack sequence applies the Implode status onto the opponent for 2s. An explosion will occur once this duration ends, dealing 75% of Xiangling's ATK as AoE Pyro DMG.

constellations.title: Deepfry
constellations.description:
Increases the Level of Pyronado by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.title: Slowbake
constellations.description: Pyronado's duration is increased by 40%.

constellations.title: Guoba Mad
constellations.description:
Increases the Level of Guoba Attack by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.title: Condensed Pyronado
constellations.description: For the duration of Pyronado, all party members receive a 15% Pyro DMG Bonus.

characters.name: Xiao
characters.title: Vigilant Yaksha
characters.description: A yaksha adeptus who defends Liyue. Also heralded as the "Conqueror of Demons" and "Vigilant Yaksha."

abilities.name: Normal Attack
abilities.description: Performs up to 6 consecutive spear strikes.

abilities.name: Charged Attack
abilities.description: Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to perform an upward thrust.

abilities.name: Plunging Attack
abilities.description: Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

skills.title: Lemniscatic Wind Cycling
skills.description:
Xiao lunges forward, dealing Anemo DMG to opponents in his path.
Can be used in mid-air.
Starts with 2 charges.

skills.title: Bane of All Evil
skills.description: Xiao dons the Yaksha Mask that set gods and demons trembling millennia ago.

abilities.name: Yaksha's Mask
descriptions: Greatly increases Xiao's jumping ability.
Increases his attack AoE and attack DMG.
Converts attack DMG into Anemo DMG, which cannot be overridden by any other elemental infusion.
In this state, Xiao will continuously lose HP.
The effects of this skill end when Xiao leaves the field.

stats: Life Drain|{param2}% Current HP Per Second

passives.title: Transcension: Gravity Defier
passives.description:
Decreases climbing Stamina consumption for your own party members by 20%.
Not stackable with Passive Talents that provide the exact same effects.

passives.title: Conqueror of Evil: Tamer of Demons
passives.description:
While under the effects of Bane of All Evil, all DMG dealt by Xiao increases by 5%. DMG increases by a further 5% for every 3s the ability persists.
The maximum DMG Bonus is 25%.

passives.title: Dissolution Eon: Heaven Fall
passives.description:
Using Lemniscatic Wind Cycling increases the DMG of subsequent uses of Lemniscatic Wind Cycling by 15%.
This effect lasts for 7s, and has a maximum of 3 stacks. Gaining a new stack refreshes the effect's duration.

constellations.title: Dissolution Eon: Destroyer of Worlds
constellations.description: Increases Lemniscatic Wind Cycling's charges by 1.

constellations.title: Annihilation Eon: Blossom of Kaleidos
constellations.description: When in the party and not on the field, Xiao's Energy Recharge is increased by 25%.

constellations.title: Conqueror of Evil: Wrath Deity
constellations.description:
Increases the Level of Lemniscatic Wind Cycling by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.title: Transcension: Extinction of Suffering
constellations.description: When Xiao's HP falls below 50%, he gains a 100% DEF Bonus.

constellations.title: Evolution Eon: Origin of Ignorance
constellations.description:
Increases the Level of Bane of All Evil by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.title: Conqueror of Evil: Guardian Yaksha
constellations.description: While under the effects of Bane of All Evil, hitting at least 2 opponents with Xiao's Plunging Attack will immediately grant him 1 charge of Lemniscatic Wind Cycling, and for the next 1s, he may use Lemniscatic Wind Cycling while ignoring its CD.

characters.name: Xingqiu
characters.title: Juvenile Galant
characters.description: A young man carrying a longsword who is frequently seen at book booths. He has a chivalrous heart and yearns for justice and fairness for all.

abilities.name: Normal Attack
abilities.description: Perform up to 5 rapid strikes.

abilities.name: Charged Attack
abilities.description: Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to unleash 2 rapid sword strikes.

abilities.name: Plunging Attack
abilities.description: Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

skills.title: Guhua Sword: Fatal Rainscreen
skills.description: Xingqiu performs twin strikes with his sword, dealing Hydro DMG. At the same time, this ability creates the maximum number of Rain Swords, which will orbit your active character.

abilities.description: The Rain Swords have the following properties:
descriptions: When a character takes DMG, the Rain Sword will shatter, reducing the amount of DMG taken.
Increases the character's resistance to interruption.
20% of Xingqiu's Hydro DMG Bonus will be converted to additional DMG Reduction for the Rain Swords.
The maximum amount of additional DMG Reduction that can be gained this way is 24%.
The initial maximum number of Rain Swords is 3.
Using this ability applies the Wet status onto the character.

skills.title: Guhua Sword: Raincutter
skills.description: Initiate Rainbow Bladework and fight using an illusory sword rain, while creating the maximum number of Rain Swords.

abilities.name: Rainbow Bladework
descriptions: Your active character's Normal Attacks will trigger consecutive sword rain attacks, dealing Hydro DMG.
Rain Swords will remain at the maximum number throughout the ability's duration.

passives.title: Flash of Genius
passives.description: When Xingqiu crafts Character Talent Materials, he has a 25% chance to refund a portion of the crafting materials used.

passives.title: Hydropathic
passives.description: When a Rain Sword is shattered or when its duration expires, it regenerates the current character's HP based on 6% of Xingqiu's Max HP.

passives.title: Blades Amidst Raindrops
passives.description: Xingqiu gains a 20% Hydro DMG Bonus.

constellations.title: The Scent Remained
constellations.description: Increases the maximum number of Rain Swords by 1.

constellations.title: Rainbow Upon the Azure Sky
constellations.description:
Extends the duration of Guhua Sword: Raincutter by 3s.
Decreases the Hydro RES of opponents hit by sword rain attacks by 15% for 4s.

constellations.title: Weaver of Verses
constellations.description:
Increases the Level of Guhua Sword: Raincutter by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.title: Evilsoother
constellations.description: Throughout the duration of Guhua Sword: Raincutter, the DMG dealt by Guhua Sword: Fatal Rainscreen is increased by 50%.

constellations.title: Embrace of Rain
constellations.description:
Increases the Level of Guhua Sword: Fatal Rainscreen by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.title: Hence, Call Them My Own Verses
constellations.description: Activating 2 of Guhua Sword: Raincutter's sword rain attacks greatly enhances the third sword rain attack. On hit, the third sword rain attack also regenerates 3 Energy for Xingqiu.

characters.name: Xinyan
characters.title: Blazing Riff
characters.description: Liyue's sole rock 'n' roll musician. She rebels against ossified prejudices using her music and passionate singing.

abilities.name: Normal Attack
abilities.description: Perform up to 4 consecutive strikes.

abilities.name: Charged Attack
abilities.description:
Drains Stamina over time to perform continuous spinning attacks against all nearby opponents.
At the end of the sequence, perform a more powerful slash.

abilities.name: Plunging Attack
abilities.description: Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

skills.title: Sweeping Fervor
skills.description:
Xinyan brandishes her instrument, dealing Pyro DMG on nearby opponents, forming a shield made out of her audience's passion.
The shield's DMG Absorption scales based on Xinyan's DEF and on the number of opponents hit.

descriptions: Hitting 0–1 opponents grants Shield Level 1: Ad Lib.
Hitting 2 opponents grants Shield Level 2: Lead-In.
Hitting 3 or more opponents grants Shield Level 3: Rave, which will also deal intermittent Pyro DMG to nearby opponents.

abilities.description: The shield has the following special properties:
descriptions: When unleashed, it infuses Xinyan with Pyro.
It has 250% DMG Absorption effectiveness against Pyro DMG.

skills.title: Riff Revolution
skills.description:
Strumming rapidly, Xinyan launches nearby opponents and deals Physical DMG to them, hyping up the crowd.
The sheer intensity of the atmosphere will cause explosions that deal Pyro DMG to nearby opponents.

passives.title: A Rad Recipe
passives.description: When a Perfect Cooking is achieved on a DEF-boosting dish, Xinyan has a 12% chance to obtain double the product.

passives.title: "The Show Goes On, Even Without An Audience..."
passives.description: Decreases the number of opponents Sweeping Fervor must hit to trigger each level of shielding.
descriptions: Shield Level 2: Lead-In requirement reduced to 1 opponent hit.
Shield Level 3: Rave requirement reduced to 2 opponents hit or more.

passives.title: "...Now That's Rock 'N' Roll!"
passives.description: Characters shielded by Sweeping Fervor deal 15% increased Physical DMG.

constellations.title: Fatal Acceleration
constellations.description:
Upon scoring a CRIT Hit, increases ATK SPD of Xinyan's Normal and Charged Attacks by 12% for 5s.
Can only occur once every 5s.

constellations.title: Impromptu Opening
constellations.description: Riff Revolution's Physical DMG has its CRIT Rate increased by 100%, and will form a shield at Shield Level 3: Rave when cast.

constellations.title: Double-Stop
constellations.description:
Increases the Level of Sweeping Fervor by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.title: Wildfire Rhythm
constellations.description: Sweeping Fervor's swing DMG decreases opponent's Physical RES by 15% for 12s.

constellations.title: Screamin' for an Encore
constellations.description:
Increases the Level of Riff Revolution by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.title: Rockin' in a Flaming World
constellations.description: Decreases the Stamina Consumption of Xinyan's Charged Attacks by 30%. Additionally, Xinyan's Charged Attacks gain an ATK Bonus equal to 50% of her DEF.

characters.name: Yae Miko
characters.title: Astute Amusement
characters.description: Lady Guuji of the Grand Narukami Shrine also serves as the editor-in-chief of Yae Publishing House. Unimaginable intelligence and cunning are hidden under her beautiful appearance.

abilities.name: Normal Attack
abilities.description: Summons forth kitsune spirits, initiating a maximum of 3 attacks that deal Electro DMG.

abilities.name: Charged Attack
abilities.description: Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to deal AoE Electro DMG after a short casting time.

abilities.name: Plunging Attack
abilities.description: Plunges towards the ground from mid-air, damaging all opponents in her path with thunderous might. Deals AoE Electro DMG upon impact with the ground.

skills.title: Yakan Evocation: Sesshou Sakura
skills.description:
To Yae, such dull tasks as can be accomplished by driving spirits out need not be done personally.
Moves swiftly, leaving a Sesshou Sakura behind.

abilities.name: Sesshou Sakura
abilities.description: Has the following properties:
descriptions: Periodically strikes one nearby opponent with lightning, dealing Electro DMG
When there are other Sesshou Sakura nearby, their level will increase, boosting the DMG dealt by these lightning strikes.
This skill has three charges.
